T02TD2582E:83a-1: a'arya manydzu shr'i manda la gu na sam bha ba bi dhi n'a ma /
T02TD2582E:83a-3: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga yon tan 'byung gnas zhes bya ba /
T02TD2582E:83a-4: bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2582E:83a-5: dpal ldan sangs rgyas kun bdag nyid //
T02TD2582E:83a-6: rigs kun bdag po ye shes sku //
T02TD2582E:83a-7: 'jam pa'i rdo rje mgon dpal dang //
T02TD2582E:83a-8: bla ma'i zhabs la rab btud nas //
T02TD2582E:83a-10: bsdus dang bye ba'i bye brag gis //
T02TD2582E:83a-11: thun mong ma yin khyad 'phags pa'i //
T02TD2582E:83a-12: cho ga'i rim pa bshad par bya //
T02TD2582E:83a-13: chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi snying po //
T02TD2582E:83a-14: mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur zhing //
T02TD2582E:83a-15: rjes su gnang ba thob pa'i slob dpon la slob ma dam tshig dang ldan pas gsol ba lan gnyis gsum gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2582E:83a-16: slob dpon gyis kyang bla na med pa'i byang chub tu dgod par bya'o zhes bsam pa bzang po dang ldan par bya'o //
T02TD2582E:83a-17: de nas slob ma de la bu khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi snying po 'dod dam zhes dri bar bya'o //
T02TD2582E:83a-18: bdag cag 'tshal lo zhes zer na snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i yid kyis slob ma de la khyod kyi 'dod pa'i don de yongs su sbyin par bya'o zhes gnang ba sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD2582E:83a-19: 'di ni slob ma yongs su gzung ba'i cho ga'o //
T02TD2582E:83a-20: de nas yid dang rjes su mthun pa'i gnas su spos chu la sogs pas legs par byugs la me tog sil ma gtor la bdug spos dri zhim ngos bdug pa dang /
T02TD2582E:83a-21: yongs su 'byor pa'i mchod pa lnga dang //
T02TD2582E:83a-22: mchod pa'i yan lag dang ldan pa dag dang //
T02TD2582E:83a-23: gdan nang tshangs can bzang po la 'dug la //
T02TD2582E:83a-24: gzhan gyi don du bsnyen pa dang //
T02TD2582E:83a-25: sgrub pa'i las brtsam par bya'o //
T02TD2582E:83a-29: sgrub pa la ni gsum ste //
T02TD2582E:83a-30: dbang bskur ba'i cho ga dang /
T02TD2582E:83a-32: shi ba la phan gdags pa'o //
T02TD2582E:83a-33: de la dang po bsnyen pa ni bdag nyid aom pra kri ti pa ri shuddha:/
T02TD2582E:83a-34: sarba dharmm'a: pra kri ti pa ri shuddho& ham /
T02TD2582E:83a-35: zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis dag pa gsum gyi khrus bya'o //
T02TD2582E:83a-36: de'i rjes la skad cig ma'i rnam pa las aom badzra ma h'a kro dha h'um zhes brjod pas /
T02TD2582E:83b-0: @83b bcom ldan 'das dpal gshin rje gshed sku mdog mthing nag zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa g-yas ral gri bsnams pa /
T02TD2582E:83b-1: g-yon sdigs mdzub kyis bgegs thams cad 'joms pa h'um gi sgra sgrogs pa mig gnyis su ma dang ta las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du h'um shin tu 'bar ba'i 'od zer gyis bgegs thams cad bskrad la /
T02TD2582E:83b-2: aom ya m'anta ka h'um phat ces bya ba'i sngags kyis bka' bsgo bar bya'o //
T02TD2582E:83b-3: snying gar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du sprin sgra nga ro ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid can las 'od zer 'phros pas 'og thams cad rdo rje'i sa gzhi /
T02TD2582E:83b-4: phyogs mtshams thams cad rdo rje'i ra ba /
T02TD2582E:83b-5: steng thams cad rdo rje'i gur dang //
T02TD2582E:83b-6: bla bre'i rang bzhin du bsam mo //
T02TD2582E:83b-7: rdo rje ra ba'i phyi rol du phyogs mtshams bcur yi ge ram bcu aom badzra raksha raksha h'um zhes pa'i sngags 'dis byin gyis brlab bo //
T02TD2582E:83b-8: 'di ni srung ba'i 'khor lo'i rim pa'o /
T02TD2582E:83b-10: // / de nas aom manydzu shr'i dzny'a na sa tva h'um zhes brjod pas 'jam dpal zhi ba sku mdog ser po zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa gzhon nu rgyan gyis brgyan par bsam mo //
T02TD2582E:83b-11: de'i lus dag yid gsum byin gyis brlabs par bya ste //
T02TD2582E:83b-12: lkog ma'i gnas su hr'i: las padma /
T02TD2582E:83b-13: de'i steng du aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du h'um /
T02TD2582E:83b-14: de yongs su gyur pa las lce rdo rjer bsam /
T02TD2582E:83b-15: sngags kyis byin gyis brlab pa ni //
T02TD2582E:83b-16: aom manydzu shr'i bi ma la dzi hva gha sam sho dha na badzra dzi hva h'um /
T02TD2582E:83b-17: de nas lag pa byin gyis brlab pa ni //
T02TD2582E:83b-18: lag pa'i mthil du aa las zla ba'i steng du h'um yongs su gyur pa las lag pa rdo rjer bsam /
T02TD2582E:83b-19: sngags kyis byin gyis brlab pa ni //
T02TD2582E:83b-20: aom manydzu shr'i padma ha sta pu rna ga re dhi ri bi ma le badzra ha sta h'um /
T02TD2582E:83b-21: yid byin gyis brlab pa ni bdag gi snying gar pam las padma 'dab ma brgyad pa /
T02TD2582E:83b-22: de'i steng du aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su dh'i: dkar ser bsam sngags kyis byin gyis brlab pa ni /
T02TD2582E:83b-23: aom manydzu shr'i bi ma le badzra tsatti h'um /
T02TD2582E:83b-24: de nas dkyil 'khor sprul par bya ste /
T02TD2582E:83b-25: rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya bcas la //
T02TD2582E:83b-26: aom manydzu shr'i manda la badzra tsakra h'um zhes brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so //
T02TD2582E:83b-27: de nas de'i spyan sngar skyabs su 'gro ste /
T02TD2582E:83b-28: phyogs bcu'i zhing khams ma lus na //
T02TD2582E:83b-29: rgyal ba sras bcas bzhugs pa rnams //
T02TD2582E:83b-30: bdag la dgongs par bya ba'i phyir //
T02TD2582E:83b-31: lus ngag yid kyis phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2582E:84a-2: nam mkha'i khams kyis mtha' gtugs pa //
T02TD2582E:84a-3: mchod sprin tshogs kyis gang gyur te //
T02TD2582E:84a-4: sras dang bcas la mchod par bgyi //
T02TD2582E:84a-5: tshe rabs thog ma med pa nas //
T02TD2582E:84a-6: nyon mongs dbang gis sdig bsags shing //
T02TD2582E:84a-7: lus ngag yid kyis spyad pa rnams //
T02TD2582E:84a-8: mgon la lan gsum bshags par bgyi //
T02TD2582E:84a-9: sems bskyed mngon par sangs rgyas nas //
T02TD2582E:84a-10: rgyal sras 'gro ba'i don bzhugs la //
T02TD2582E:84a-11: nyan thos rang rgyal skye bo yi //
T02TD2582E:84a-12: bsod nams byed la yi rang ngo //
T02TD2582E:84a-14: bdud bzhi zil gyis mnan pa dang //
T02TD2582E:84a-15: byang chub rnam gsum thob bya'i phyir //
T02TD2582E:84a-16: 'khor lo bla med bskor bar bskul //
T02TD2582E:84a-17: 'jig rten bde la dgod par bya //
T02TD2582E:84a-18: srog chags byang chub rgyu yin phyir //
T02TD2582E:84a-19: rgyal sras mya ngan 'da' bzhed la //
T02TD2582E:84a-20: mya ngan mi 'da' bzhugs su gsol //
T02TD2582E:84a-21: dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad dang //
T02TD2582E:84a-22: rgyal sras rnams la bdag dbul gyis //
T02TD2582E:84a-23: bdag ni dus gsum thams cad du //
T02TD2582E:84a-24: so sor khyed kyis bzhes su gsol //
T02TD2582E:84a-25: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rnams //
T02TD2582E:84a-27: ma lus bdag la dgongs su gsol //
T02TD2582E:84a-28: nam zhig byang chub snying po la //
T02TD2582E:84a-29: yongs su gnas kyi bar dag tu //
T02TD2582E:84a-30: bdag gis byang chub mchog gi sems //
T02TD2582E:84a-31: ma lus par ni bskyed par bgyi'o //
T02TD2582E:84a-32: thugs rje che dang ldan pa yi //
T02TD2582E:84a-33: bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum //
T02TD2582E:84a-34: 'gro ba'i don kun mdzad pa la //
T02TD2582E:84a-35: bdag ni gus pas skyabs su mchi //
T02TD2582E:84a-36: ji ltar 'jig rten mgon po rnams //
T02TD2582E:84a-37: byang chub tu ni nges mdzad pa'i //
T02TD2582E:84a-38: byang chub sems ni bla med pa //
T02TD2582E:84a-39: dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi //
T02TD2582E:84a-40: sangs rgyas rnal 'byor sdom pa la //
T02TD2582E:84a-41: tshul khrims kyi ni bslab pa dang //
T02TD2582E:84a-42: dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang //
T02TD2582E:84a-43: sems can don byed tshul khrims gsum //
T02TD2582E:84a-44: bdag gis brtan por gzung bar bgyi //
T02TD2582E:84a-45: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te //
T02TD2582E:84a-46: bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum //
T02TD2582E:84a-47: deng nas brtsams te gzung bar bgyi //
T02TD2582E:84a-48: nam du yang ni mi spang ngo //
T02TD2582E:84a-49: rdo rje rigs mchog chen po la //
T02TD2582E:84a-50: rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya yang //
T02TD2582E:84a-51: yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi'o //
T02TD2582E:84a-52: slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar bgyi //
T02TD2582E:84a-53: rin chen rigs mchog chen po yis //
T02TD2582E:84b-0: @84b dam tshig yid du 'ong ba la //
T02TD2582E:84b-1: nyin re bzhin du dus drug tu //
T02TD2582E:84b-2: sbyin pa rnam bzhin rtag tu sbyin //
T02TD2582E:84b-3: byang chub chen po las byung ba'i //
T02TD2582E:84b-4: padma'i rigs chen dag pa la //
T02TD2582E:84b-5: phyi nang gsang ba'i theg pa gsum //
T02TD2582E:84b-6: dam pa'i chos ni gzung bar bgyi //
T02TD2582E:84b-7: las kyi rigs mchog chen po la //
T02TD2582E:84b-8: sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni //
T02TD2582E:84b-9: yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi //
T02TD2582E:84b-10: mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bgyi //
T02TD2582E:84b-11: byang chub sems ni bla med pa //
T02TD2582E:84b-12: dam pa bdag gis bskyed bgyis nas //
T02TD2582E:84b-13: sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir //
T02TD2582E:84b-14: bdag gis sdom pa ma lus bzung //
T02TD2582E:84b-15: ma grol ba rnams grol bar bgyi //
T02TD2582E:84b-16: ma bsgral ba rnams bsgral bar bgyi //
T02TD2582E:84b-17: dbugs ma phyung ba dbugs dbyung bgyi //
T02TD2582E:84b-18: sems can mya ngan 'das la dgong //
T02TD2582E:84b-19: de nas ngag gi dri ma dag par bya ba'i phyir lha la bstod de /
T02TD2582E:84b-20: bde ba las 'khrungs rdo rje 'chang ba yi //
T02TD2582E:84b-21: dngos dang dngos med 'byung gnas chen por mkhyen //
T02TD2582E:84b-22: dang po gang du rnam par snang mdzad che //
T02TD2582E:84b-23: dag cing dri med blos ni aom du sprul //
T02TD2582E:84b-24: gzugs mang phreng ba'i tshul du bskor ba yi //
T02TD2582E:84b-25: sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02TD2582E:84b-26: de nas lha rnams dgyes nas lha de dag gis bdag la bstod par bsam mo //
T02TD2582E:84b-27: de nas drin lan gyi tshul du mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas phar la bstod par bya'o //
T02TD2582E:84b-28: 'di ni bsod nams kyi tshogs bsags pa'i yan lag go //
T02TD2582E:84b-29: de nas khyad bar gyi tshogs bsags par bya ba'i phyir phyag ldas rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas mnyes par bya ste /
T02TD2582E:84b-30: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta k'a ya b'aka tsi tta pra na ma me badzra band'a nam k'a ro mi /
T02TD2582E:84b-31: zhes bya bas rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor la phyag bya'o //
T02TD2582E:84b-32: aom sarba ta th'a ga p'u dzo pasth'a na ya a'atma nam nary'i ta y'a mi /
T02TD2582E:84b-33: sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra satva aa dhi tishtha sva m'am /
T02TD2582E:84b-34: zhes bya ba mi bskyod pa la phyag bya'o //
T02TD2582E:84b-35: aom sarba th'a ga ta p'u dza aa bhi she ka a'atma nam niry'a ta y'a mi /
T02TD2582E:84b-36: sarba tha th'a ga ta badzra ratna aa bhi shinytsa m'am /
T02TD2582E:84b-37: zhes bya ba 'di srin chen 'byung ldan gyi dkyil 'khor la phyag bya'o //
T02TD2582E:84b-38: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u dza karma ni /
T02TD2582E:84b-39: a'atma nam nirya ta y'a mi /
T02TD2582E:84b-40: sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra karma ku ru m'am /
T02TD2582E:84b-41: zhes bya ba 'dos don yod grub pa'i dkyil 'khor la phyag bya'o //
T02TD2582E:84b-42: aom sarba tha th'a ga ta p'u dza pra barta na ya a'atma nam ni ry'a ta ya mi sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra dtarmma [*dharmma] pra batta y'a m'am /
T02TD2582E:84b-43: zhes bya ba 'dis rnam pa mtha' yas kyi dkyil 'khor la phyag bya'o //
T02TD2582E:85a-3: mngon par byang chub pa'ang bsgom pa dang /
T02TD2582E:85a-4: rten gyi dkyil 'khor bsgom pa dang //
T02TD2582E:85a-5: gangs can mtsho bsgom pa dang /
T02TD2582E:85a-6: dang po'i sangs rgyas bsgom pa dang /
T02TD2582E:85a-9: rigs so sor phye ba dang /
T02TD2582E:85a-10: lha bsgom zhing dbyung ba dang //
T02TD2582E:85a-12: las rgyal mchog rnams bsgom pa'o //
T02TD2582E:85a-13: lha rnams gdan gyi steng du mtshan gyi sngags dang yig 'bru las lha'i skur bskyed la ye shes sems dpa' gzhug par bya ste //
T02TD2582E:85a-14: bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas 'phrin las kyi 'phags pa 'jam dpal sku mdog ser po zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa /
T02TD2582E:85a-15: dang po'i sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo de shar phyogs kyi sgor 'dug la mchod pa byin gyis brlab par bya ste //
T02TD2582E:85a-17: zhes pas mchod pa la gnod pa'i bar gcod kyi bgegs rnams bskrad do //
T02TD2582E:85a-18: aom shi kha re ru ta ma ta h'um /
T02TD2582E:85a-19: zhes bya bas bsang bar bya'o //
T02TD2582E:85a-20: mchod yon dang zhal bsil la ni aom a'a: h'um /
T02TD2582E:85a-21: zhes bya bas byin gyis brlab pa'o //
T02TD2582E:85a-22: mchod pa lnga'i rang rang gi sngags kyis byin gyis brlab pa'o //
T02TD2582E:85a-25: aom badzra a'a lo ke h'um /
T02TD2582E:85a-27: aom badzra nee wi hye h'um /
T02TD2582E:85a-28: de nas aom badzra pra be sha ya phags /
T02TD2582E:85a-30: rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yi //
T02TD2582E:85a-31: lag pa gnyis ni sbyor bar bcings //
T02TD2582E:85a-32: se gos brdab cing brjod do //
T02TD2582E:85a-33: aom badzra sa ma ya dza: h'um bam ho: sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar bya //
T02TD2582E:85a-34: spos snod lag tu thogs la //
T02TD2582E:85a-35: ma lus phyogs na bzhugs pa yi //
T02TD2582E:85a-37: sangs rgyas thams cad bzhugs su gsol //
T02TD2582E:85a-38: bdag ming 'di zhes bzhi ba ni //
T02TD2582E:85a-39: sangs rgyas thams cad sbyar 'dren pas //
T02TD2582E:85a-40: deng 'dir sangs rgyas kun gshegs te //
T02TD2582E:85a-41: dngos grub 'di ni stsal du gsol //
T02TD2582E:85a-42: aom ae hye hi bha ga b'ana badzra aam ku sha dza: h'um bam ho /
T02TD2582E:85a-44: de nas mchod yon dbul te /
T02TD2582E:85a-45: bcom ldan thugs rjes byon pa legs //
T02TD2582E:85a-46: bdag ni bsod nams skal bar ldan //
T02TD2582E:85a-47: bdag gi mchod yon bzhes nas kyang //
T02TD2582E:85a-48: 'di nyid du ni bzhugs su gsol //
T02TD2582E:85a-49: aom aa rgham p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra nas ma ye h'um /
T02TD2582E:85b-0: @85b de nas zhal bsil dbul te //
T02TD2582E:85b-1: ji ltar bcom ldan 'jam dbyangs kyis //
T02TD2582E:85b-2: rang bzhin dag pa'i ye shes la //
T02TD2582E:85b-3: gzung 'dzin dri ma mi mnga' yang //
T02TD2582E:85b-4: 'gro ba'i don du sku khrus gsol /
T02TD2582E:85b-5: aom sarba tath'a ga ta pra ba ra satk'a ra pra t'itstsha ho:/
T02TD2582E:85b-6: de nas 'dod pa'i don la gsol ba gdab pa dang /
T02TD2582E:85b-7: bdag dang 'gro la thugs brtse'i phyir //
T02TD2582E:85b-8: nyid kyi rdzu 'phrul mthu yis ni //
T02TD2582E:85b-9: ji srid mchod pa bdag bgyid na //
T02TD2582E:85b-10: de srid bcom ldan bzhugs su gsol //
T02TD2582E:85b-13: de nas bstod pa bya ba ni //
T02TD2582E:85b-14: mnyam nyid mi g-yo mnyam nyid mchog chos can //
T02TD2582E:85b-15: thugs rjes rang bzhin 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal sel //
T02TD2582E:85b-16: yon tan kun mnyam mtha' yas dngos grub stsol //
T02TD2582E:85b-17: dri med mi g-yo mnyam nyid mchog chos can //
T02TD2582E:85b-18: sems can khams la dam chos dngos grub stsol //
T02TD2582E:85b-19: dngos grub mnyam dang mtha' med mtha' bral ba //
T02TD2582E:85b-20: mi mnyam mnyam pa'i dpe ni mkha' la bde //
T02TD2582E:85b-21: yon tan phra ba'i cha shas mtshungs pa med //
T02TD2582E:85b-22: rtag tu dri med thugs rje'i shugs las byung //
T02TD2582E:85b-23: smon lam grub cing mi 'gag chos nyid can //
T02TD2582E:85b-24: 'gro ba'i don grub lhur mdzad mtha' yas pa //
T02TD2582E:85b-25: thugs rje'i bdag nyid drug tu rnam par snang //
T02TD2582E:85b-26: dpag med mi rdzogs gnas nyid legs rdzogs te //
T02TD2582E:85b-27: bde gnas gshegs dang thugs rje spyod mi g-yo //
T02TD2582E:85b-28: 'jig rten mchog gi dngos grub stsol mdzad pa //
T02TD2582E:85b-29: bdag nyid mi 'gyur kye ma chos nyid bzang //
T02TD2582E:85b-30: mchog stsol mchog nyid nang nas mchog brnyes pa //
T02TD2582E:85b-31: khams gsum kun la dngos grub stsol mdzad pa //
T02TD2582E:85b-32: mgon po dus gsum dri med rab mkhyen pa //
T02TD2582E:85b-33: kun gyi dngos grub mchog gsum bdag la stsol //
T02TD2582E:85b-35: aom badzra aam ku sha dza: zhes pas nang du gzhug / ya m'anta ka h'um phags /
T02TD2582E:85b-39: aa a'a sarba ta th'a ga ta hri da ya /
T02TD2582E:85b-41: aom h'um hr'i: bha ga b'ana dzny'a rna m'u rti w'a g'i shva ra ma h'a p'a tsa sarba dharmma ga ga na aa ma la su pa ri shuddha dharmma dh'a tu dzny'a na garbha a'a: dri shya sa ma ya stvam aa ham /
T02TD2582E:85b-43: yang de bzhin du dri shaya dza: h'um bam ho: sa ma ya stvam a'a: h'am /
T02TD2582E:85b-44: zhes gnyis su med par bsam mo //
T02TD2582E:85b-45: yang rtsa ba'i sngags de nyid kyi rjes la //
T02TD2582E:86a-0: @86a * // zhes pas lha thams cad kyi thugs kar aa las 'od 'phros nas yon tan dang 'phrin las kyi ngo bor bsdus nas /
T02TD2582E:86a-1: sna tshogs rdo rjer gyur pa las aas mtshan pa'o //
T02TD2582E:86a-2: yang de bzhin du aom badzra dharmma hr'i: aom badzra tsakra aom /
T02TD2582E:86a-6: rdo rje dang ldan pa mgrin pa dang /

T02TD2582E:89a-13: h'um h'um h'um badzra k'i la ya badzra dha ro a'adzny'a pa ya ti k'a ya b'a kdzitat badzra k'i la ya h'um /
T02TD2582E:89a-14: zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis phur bu btab la /
T02TD2582E:89a-15: pur bu'i phyi rol du rdo rje'i ra ba dra ba dang bcas pa bsam //
T02TD2582E:89a-17: zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis bsrung bar bya'o //
T02TD2582E:89a-18: de nas sa'i lha mo nam mkha' la phab la de la gtor ma byin la sa la thim par bya'o //
T02TD2582E:89a-19: 'di ni sa bslang ba'i rim pa'o /
T02TD2582E:89a-21: // / de nas dkyil 'khor gyi sa tsandan la sogs pa'i dri'i chus byugs la lha'i grangs dang mnyam pa'i dri'i thig le zlum po byas la de la me tog gi tshom bu bkod la skad cig mas dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo skyed la /
T02TD2582E:89a-22: de la mchod pa dang bstod pa byas la //
T02TD2582E:89a-23: mkhyen par gsol ba ni pus mo g-yas pa'i lha da sa la btsugs te 'di skad ces brjod do //
T02TD2582E:89a-24: 'jam dpal dpa' bo rdo rje che //
T02TD2582E:89a-25: rig pa'i rgyal po khyod la 'dud //
T02TD2582E:89a-26: dkyil 'khor thugs rje'i bdag nyid can //
T02TD2582E:89a-27: mgon po bdag nyid bri bar 'tshal //
T02TD2582E:89a-28: slob ma rnams la brtse ba dang /
T02TD2582E:89a-29: khyod la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir //
T02TD2582E:89a-30: bcom ldan bdag ni gus pa la //
T02TD2582E:89a-31: de la bka' drin mdzad par 'os //
T02TD2582E:89a-33: sangs rgyas bdag la dgongs su gsol //
T02TD2582E:89a-34: 'bras gnas byang chub sems dpa' dang /
T02TD2582E:89a-35: sngags kyi lha gzhan gang lags dang //
T02TD2582E:89a-36: 'jig rten skyong ba'i lha rnams dang //
T02TD2582E:89a-37: gang yang 'byung po mthu chen dang //
T02TD2582E:89b-0: sangs @89b rgyas bstan la dga' ba rnams //
T02TD2582E:89b-2: 'gro ba dag phyir bdag bri bas //
T02TD2582E:89b-3: bdag dan slob mar bcas pa la //
T02TD2582E:89b-4: dkyil 'khor byin brlabs dngos grub stsol //
T02TD2582E:89b-6: 'di ni lha lhag par gnas pa'i rim pa'o //
T02TD2582E:89b-7: de nas dngul lam gser gyi bum pa kha dog dkar por 'gyur la lha'i grangs dang mnyam ba'am //
T02TD2582E:89b-8: yang na rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa dang las thams cad pa'i bum pa'o //
T02TD2582E:89b-9: de nas las thams cad pa la sna tshogs rdo rje bri //
T02TD2582E:89b-10: rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa la rigs drug gi mtshan ma bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2582E:89b-11: gtso bo'i bum par sman lnga dang /
T02TD2582E:89b-14: dri ldas bkang la mgul pa la chi ngas nyis rim du bcings la me tog gi phreng ba dang gdugs dkar pos de g-yogs par bya'o //
T02TD2582E:89b-15: gzhan dag tu yang dri zhim po'i chus dgad par bya'o //
T02TD2582E:89b-16: shing bzang po'i lo mas kha brgyan par bya'o //
T02TD2582E:89b-17: yang na bum pa brgyad dgod par bya'o //
T02TD2582E:89b-18: gtso bo'i bum par skad cig gis lha tshang par bskyed la dgug gzhug dang mchod bstod dang bzlas pa bya'o //
T02TD2582E:89b-19: las thams cad pa'i bum par gshin rje gshed bskyed la dgug gzhug dang mchod bstod dang bzlas pa bya'o //
T02TD2582E:89b-20: rnam par rgyal ba'i bum par bzhu bar bya'o //
T02TD2582E:89b-21: las thams cad pa'i bum par ni mi bzhu'o //
T02TD2582E:89b-22: de nas bum pa rnams ras gtsang ma'i steng du gzhag go /'di ni bum pa lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga'o /
T02TD2582E:89b-24: // / de nas bar chod zhi bar bya ba dang dngos grub nye bar bya ba'i phyir gzhung gzhan du bshad pa'i sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02TD2582E:89b-25: de nas phyi rol du gtor ma chag sum gtang ngo //
T02TD2582E:89b-26: de'i rjes la slob ma lhag par gnas par bya'o //
T02TD2582E:89b-27: shar phyogs su mandala byas nas phyag bya ste /
T02TD2582E:89b-28: pus mo las la btsugs la thal mo sbyar bar bya ste //
T02TD2582E:89b-29: dga' che khyod bdag ston pa yin //
T02TD2582E:89b-30: slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol//
T02TD2582E:89b-31: byang chub sems dpa'i tshul brtan pa //
T02TD2582E:89b-32: mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2582E:89b-33: mgon po de nyid bdag la stsol //
T02TD2582E:89b-34: byang chub sems kyang bdag la stsol //
T02TD2582E:89b-35: thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu //
T02TD2582E:89b-36: mgon po bdag nyid 'jug par mdzod //
T02TD2582E:89b-38: de nas slob dpon gyis slob ma la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2582E:90a-0: @90a * // bu tshur theg pa chen po yi //
T02TD2582E:90a-1: tshul chen snod ni khyod yin te /
T02TD2582E:90a-2: gsang sngags spyod pa'i tshol gyi mchog / khyod la yang dag bstan par bya //
T02TD2582E:90a-3: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang 'das dang //
T02TD2582E:90a-4: de bzhin gang dag ma byon dang //
T02TD2582E:90a-5: da ltar byung ba'i rdzogs sangs rgyas //
T02TD2582E:90a-6: 'gro la phan phyir bzhugs pa dang /
T02TD2582E:90a-7: de dag kun gyi gsang sngags kyis //
T02TD2582E:90a-8: cho ga zab mo 'di mkhyen nas //
T02TD2582E:90a-9: dpa' bo byang chub shing drung du //
T02TD2582E:90a-10: thams cad mkhyen pa tshad med brnyes //
T02TD2582E:90a-11: skyob pa 'jam pa'i rdo rje yis //
T02TD2582E:90a-12: bdud sde shin tu mi bzad pa //
T02TD2582E:90a-13: dpung chen dag kyang de yis bcom //
T02TD2582E:90a-14: de phyir kun mkhyen thob bya'i phyir //
T02TD2582E:90a-15: bu yis blo gros 'di gyis shig //
T02TD2582E:90a-17: de nas yang slob mas 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2582E:90a-18: dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2582E:90a-19: dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi //
T02TD2582E:90a-20: sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags //
T02TD2582E:90a-21: bsod nams kun la rjes yi rang //
T02TD2582E:90a-22: byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed bgyi //
T02TD2582E:90a-23: sems cad thams cad mgrin du gnyer //
T02TD2582E:90a-24: 'gro phan sangs rgyas 'grub par shog / ces bya //
T02TD2582E:90a-25: de nas bu'i snying gar rdo rje bzung la sa ma ya aa //
T02TD2582E:90a-26: su ra ta stvam badzra stva sa ma ya ho /
T02TD2582E:90a-27: badzra stva ya th'a su kham zhes pas slob ma ye shes sems dpar bskyed do //
T02TD2582E:90a-28: de nas slob dpon gyis slob ma la //
T02TD2582E:90a-29: aom a'a: h'um zhes bya bas /
T02TD2582E:90a-30: spyi bo dang mgrin pa dang /
T02TD2582E:90a-31: thugs ka rnams su rdo rje dang 'khor lo dang padma bsam mo //
T02TD2582E:90a-32: khu tshur g-yas pas rdo rje bzung la gnas gsum du reg par bya'o //
T02TD2582E:90a-33: de nas slob ma de la spyi bor me tog / mdun du bdug spos /
T02TD2582E:90a-37: sor bcu gnyis pa'i tshad kyis so //
T02TD2582E:90a-38: shing aa shvad tha dad au du mw'a ra la sogs pa'i rgyu las byung ba //
T02TD2582E:90a-39: gas chag med pa drang po me tog gi phreng ba can //
T02TD2582E:90a-40: aom ya m'a nta ka h'um zhes pa'i sngags kyis mngon par bzlas te sbyin no //
T02TD2582E:90a-41: de nas so shing bca' ste /
T02TD2582E:90a-42: ba lang gi ko ba tsam gyi mandala byugs la /
T02TD2582E:90a-43: kha shar du bltas la drang por dor ro //
T02TD2582E:90a-44: de la bdag nyid la rtse mo bltas na mchog grub la //
T02TD2582E:90a-45: shar du bltas na 'bring du bshad la /
T02TD2582E:90a-46: mtshams dang byang shar du bltas na 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub thob //
T02TD2582E:90a-47: so shing por la mthur du bltas na 'og gi dngos grub thob bo //
T02TD2582E:90b-0: @90b de'i dri chu la aom pra kri ti pa ri shuddhe sarba dha rmma pra kri ti pa ri shuddho& ham /
T02TD2582E:90b-1: zhes pas mngon par bsngags te hub gsum blud par bya'o //
T02TD2582E:90b-2: aom ya m'anta ka h'um phat /
T02TD2582E:90b-3: zhes bya ba bzlos pas ku sha sngas su sbyin zhing sngags de nyid bzlas par stan du yang sbyin no //
T02TD2582E:90b-4: aom a'a: h'um bzlas pa'i skud pa mdud pa gsum dang ldan pa yang dpung pa g-yon pa la gdags so //
T02TD2582E:90b-5: de brtan par bya ba'i phyir //
T02TD2582E:90b-6: aom manydzu shr'i sa ma ya ma nu p'a la ya //
T02TD2582E:90b-7: manydzu shr'i tve no pa tishatha /
T02TD2582E:90b-9: su to shyo me bha ba /
T02TD2582E:90b-10: su po shyo me bha ba //
T02TD2582E:90b-11: aa bu ra kto me bha ba /
T02TD2582E:90b-12: sarba siddhi mme pra ya tstsha sarba karmma su tsa ma /
T02TD2582E:90b-13: tsittam shre ya: ku ru h'um ha ha ha ha ho: //
T02TD2582E:90b-14: bha ga b'an sarba ta th'a ga to manydzu shr'i m'a me munytsa badzr'i bha ba /
T02TD2582E:90b-15: ma h'a sa ma ya stva a'a: de nas tshigs su bcad pa 'dis spo ba bskyed par bya'o //
T02TD2582E:90b-16: 'jig rten du ni kun mkhyen rnams //
T02TD2582E:90b-17: au dumw'a ra'i me tog bzhin //
T02TD2582E:90b-18: brgya lam yang ni res 'ga' zhig /'byung 'gyur yang ni mi 'byung ngo //
T02TD2582E:90b-19: gsang sngags kyi ni chos 'byung ba //
T02TD2582E:90b-20: de bas kyang ni dkon pa ste //
T02TD2582E:90b-21: gang gis dri med sems cad don //
T02TD2582E:90b-22: mya nang mi 'da' byed par nus //
T02TD2582E:90b-23: gang dag pa yi mchog 'di la //
T02TD2582E:90b-24: blo gro shin tu mi g-yo bas //
T02TD2582E:90b-25: de dag gis ni 'khor ba'i rgyun //
T02TD2582E:90b-26: sdug bsngal kun 'byung bde ba can //
T02TD2582E:90b-27: bdag nyid chen po khyed rnams kyis //
T02TD2582E:90b-28: rnyed pa mnyam med de ring brnyes //
T02TD2582E:90b-29: gang phyir sangs rgyas sras bcas pa'i //
T02TD2582E:90b-30: bdag nyid che po kun gyis ni //
T02TD2582E:90b-31: bstan pa 'di la khyed rnams kun //
T02TD2582E:90b-32: yongs su bzung nas skye bzhin pas //
T02TD2582E:90b-33: der ni khyed rnams 'dong ba ni //
T02TD2582E:90b-34: theg pa chen por cher 'byung ba'i //
T02TD2582E:90b-35: lam mchog 'di ni dpal dang ldan /
T02TD2582E:90b-36: khyed rnams der ni 'gro bas na //
T02TD2582E:90b-37: rang byung skal ba che po la //
T02TD2582E:90b-38: 'jig rten thams cad mkhyen pa yi //
T02TD2582E:90b-39: de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ba yin //
T02TD2582E:90b-41: de nas thal mo sbyar te tshig 'di skad brjod de //
T02TD2582E:90b-42: khyad par gyi sdom pa 'dzin du gzhug go //
T02TD2582E:90b-43: me ldog pa yi dang bskur ba //
T02TD2582E:90b-44: mgon pos bdag la stsal nas kyang //
T02TD2582E:90b-45: dkyil 'khor lha yi de nyid dang //
T02TD2582E:90b-46: slob dpon 'phrin las yongs su gsungs //
T02TD2582E:90b-47: sangs rgyas kun gyi dam tshig dang //
T02TD2582E:90b-48: sdom pa bla na med pa gsungs //
T02TD2582E:90b-49: sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir //
T02TD2582E:90b-50: bdag ni rtag tu slob dpon bgyid //
T02TD2582E:91a-1: nas rmi lam du ci byung ba nang par nga la smros shig ces brjod la gtong ngo //
T02TD2582E:91a-2: de nas nang par rmi lam 'dzem pa med par bzlas so //
T02TD2582E:91a-3: rmi lam sangs rgyas mthong na ni //
T02TD2582E:91a-4: yon tan rgya mtsho mngon sum bzhin //
T02TD2582E:91a-5: mchod rten dang ni sku gzugs mthong //
T02TD2582E:91a-6: zhes pa la sogs pa rmi lam smras la ngan pa mthong na sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02TD2582E:91a-7: 'di ni slob ma lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga'o /
T02TD2582E:91a-9: // / de nas skya rengs shar ba'i dus su lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa'i snying gar mandala gyi lha rnams bsdus la dkyil 'khor gyi sa gzhi dris nye bar byugs la /
T02TD2582E:91a-10: gang zag dbang po rab kyis ni dri'i thig le dang me tog gi tshom bu lha'i grangs dang mnyam par byas la //
T02TD2582E:91a-11: de'i steng du dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams ting nge 'dzin gyis bskyed la /
T02TD2582E:91a-12: dbang po rab kyis ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba dang /
T02TD2582E:91a-13: rab tu gnas pa dang shi ba la phan gdags pa rnams bya'o //
T02TD2582E:91a-14: gang zag dbang po 'bring gis ni bris sku'i dkyil 'khor mandala de nyid steng du bkod la dbang bskur ba la sogs pa bya'o //
T02TD2582E:91a-15: gang zag dbang po tha mas ni rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor de nyid du bkod la dbang bskur ba la sogs pa bya'o //
T02TD2582E:91a-16: gsar pa legs par bsgril ba ni //
T02TD2582E:91a-17: kha dog lngas ni legs bsgyur la //
T02TD2582E:91a-18: sbyin gyis brlab par byas nas ni //
T02TD2582E:91a-19: dkyil 'khor gyi ni thig gdab po //
T02TD2582E:91a-21: nyi ma shar khar bdag rgyan dang ldan par byas la /
T02TD2582E:91a-22: tshon skud sna lnga'i skud pa bkal pa stong pa nyid las /
T02TD2582E:91a-23: h'um tram hr'i: a'a: aom las 'od zer gyi rigs lnga'i thugs ka nas yig 'bru lnga spyan drangs te gnyis su med par bstim par byas la ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin du bsams la bsgril par bya'o //
T02TD2582E:91a-24: tsandan la sogs pas bsgos pa'i snod du bzhag la mchod pa ldas mchod par bya'o //
T02TD2582E:91a-25: 'di ni thig skud bkal ba'i rim pa'o /
T02TD2582E:91a-27: // / de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis srad bu g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis bzung la //
T02TD2582E:91a-28: dzdza zhes grub pa'i grogs mchog gi lag tu gtad do //
T02TD2582E:91a-29: phyogs thams cad mnyam pa nyid du bsgom par bya zhing ci bde bar gdab par bya //
T02TD2582E:91a-30: shar du bltas te thig dang po gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2582E:91a-31: slob dpon lhor kha bltas la tshangs thig gnyis pa gdab par bya //
T02TD2582E:91b-0: de nas me'i phyogs kyi @91b char gnas la kha byang du bltas la phyi'i thig gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2582E:91b-2: lho phyogs su bltas nas nub kyi thig gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2582E:91b-3: de nyid du 'dug ste byang gi thig gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2582E:91b-5: lho phyogs su thig gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2582E:91b-7: rlung gi phyogs kyi bar mtshams su bar gyi thig gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2582E:91b-8: yang bden bral gyi phyogs su gnas te dbang ldan gyi bar mtshams kyi bar du thig gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2582E:91b-9: slob dpon gyis kyang slob ma'i skor phyogs su 'gro bar bya'o //
T02TD2582E:91b-10: de ltar thig chen brgyad btab pas //
T02TD2582E:91b-12: so so'am cha chen bcu drug tu //
T02TD2582E:91b-13: so sor rnam par dbye bar bya //
T02TD2582E:91b-15: cha chen po bcu drug la //
T02TD2582E:91b-16: cha bran so sor bgos la gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2582E:91b-17: phyogs re re nas cha chen po brgyad yod pa las //
T02TD2582E:91b-18: cha gsum la ni nang gi dkyil 'khor bya'o //
T02TD2582E:91b-19: cha gnyis la ni dkyil 'khor bar ma'i thig gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2582E:91b-20: cha chen po gsum la ni phyi'i dkyil 'khor bya'o //
T02TD2582E:91b-21: dkyil 'khor gsum ka yang zur bzhi pa sgo bzhi rta babs dang bcas pa tva ra nas yongs su brgyan pa'o //
T02TD2582E:91b-22: de ltar dkyil 'khor gyi thig gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2582E:91b-23: de nas so sor rnam par dbye bar bya ste /
T02TD2582E:91b-24: zhes gsungs pas na cha bran so sor bgos la thig gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2582E:91b-25: de la nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi thig gdab par bya ste /
T02TD2582E:91b-26: tshangs pa'i thig gi g-yas g-yon nas //
T02TD2582E:91b-27: cha chung bcu gnyis yod pa de //
T02TD2582E:91b-28: gnyis gnyis su ni dbye bar bya'o //
T02TD2582E:91b-29: tshangs pa'i thig gi g-yas g-yon nas //
T02TD2582E:91b-30: gsum pa dang ni lnga pa dang //
T02TD2582E:91b-31: bcu gsum pa dang bcu drug pa //
T02TD2582E:91b-32: de bzhin bcu dgu pa dag la //
T02TD2582E:91b-33: cha lnga phyogs bzhir bgo byas la //
T02TD2582E:91b-34: sgo khyud la sogs rnam lnga yis //
T02TD2582E:91b-35: tshon sna lnga yis sa gzhir bsgyur //
T02TD2582E:91b-36: de nas pho brang rim pa ni //
T02TD2582E:91b-37: cha bran bdun las bskor byas te //
T02TD2582E:91b-38: de nas cha chung gcig gis bskor //
T02TD2582E:91b-39: nang gi rdo rje ra bar bshad //
T02TD2582E:91b-40: de nang cha bzhi 'khor lo bya'o //
T02TD2582E:91b-41: dbus kyi lte ba cha gnyis yin //
T02TD2582E:91b-42: 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi lte bar byas //
T02TD2582E:91b-43: rtsibs bzhi dag dang bcas pa ni //
T02TD2582E:91b-44: gtso bo lnga dang yum bzhir gnas //
T02TD2582E:92a-2: bskor te 'khor lo rtsibs bcu drug / sems dpa' bcu drug gnas su bshad //
T02TD2582E:92a-3: cha gcig rdo rje'i ra bar bskor //
T02TD2582E:92a-4: de yi gru chang bzhi po la //
T02TD2582E:92a-5: sgeg mo la sogs gnas su bshad //
T02TD2582E:92a-6: sgo bzhi dag tu sgo ba dgod //
T02TD2582E:92a-7: phyi rol cha lnga yod pa la //
T02TD2582E:92a-8: cha bzhi nam mkha' stong par bya //
T02TD2582E:92a-9: cha gnyis la ni rta babs bya //
T02TD2582E:92a-10: gdugs dang 'khor lo cha re yin //
T02TD2582E:92a-11: dkyil 'khor bar ma'i thig gdab pa //
T02TD2582E:92a-12: cha chen gnyis po bzhi ru dbye //
T02TD2582E:92a-13: cha chen gcig la lha snam bya //
T02TD2582E:92a-14: cha gsum bzhi bzhir dbye bar bya //
T02TD2582E:92a-15: de ltar bcu gnyis yod pa la//
T02TD2582E:92a-16: dang po dang ni bzhi pa dang //
T02TD2582E:92a-17: de bzhin du ni bdun pa rnams //
T02TD2582E:92a-18: cha lnga dag tu bgo byas te //
T02TD2582E:92a-19: tshon sna lnga yis sa gzhi bsgyur //
T02TD2582E:92a-20: nam mkha' stong pa cha chung gcig / rta babs la ni cha gnyis te //
T02TD2582E:92a-21: gdugs dang 'khor lo cha re yin //
T02TD2582E:92a-22: phyi rol dkyil 'khor thig gdab pa //
T02TD2582E:92a-23: cha chen gsum ni bzhi bzhir dbye //
T02TD2582E:92a-24: cha lnga rigs lnga'i snam bu ste //
T02TD2582E:92a-25: cha bdun gnyis gnyis dbye bar bya //
T02TD2582E:92a-26: de ltar bcu bzhi yod pa la //
T02TD2582E:92a-27: dang po dang ni lnga pa dang //
T02TD2582E:92a-28: de bzhin dgu pa cha chung bgo //
T02TD2582E:92a-29: tshon sna lnga yis sa gzhi bsgyur //
T02TD2582E:92a-30: nam mkha' stong pa cha chung gcig / rta babs la ni cha gnyis te ;
T02TD2582E:92a-31: ; gdugs dang 'khor lo cha re yin //
T02TD2582E:92a-32: rdo rje me ri cha re ste //
T02TD2582E:92a-33: de ltar phyogs bzhir bgo byas la //
T02TD2582E:92a-34: rigs bsdus dkyil 'khor thig gdab po //
T02TD2582E:92a-35: nga ni rigs so sor phye ba'i dkyil 'khor thig gdab pa ni //
T02TD2582E:92a-36: byang sems rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ni //
T02TD2582E:92a-38: rnam par snang mdzad dkyil 'khor ni //
T02TD2582E:92a-39: gtso bo cha gsum gdung cha gcig //
T02TD2582E:92a-40: nang gi phyogs bzhir cha drug yin //
T02TD2582E:92a-41: phyi yi phyogs bzhir cha bdud te //
T02TD2582E:92a-42: phyi yi rdo rje phreng cha gcig //
T02TD2582E:92a-43: mi bskyod pa yi dkyil 'khor ni //
T02TD2582E:92a-44: phyi ru rdo rje phreng cha gcig //
T02TD2582E:92a-45: shar du cha bzhi lho byang gi tshangs thig thad kar cha bzhi ste //
T02TD2582E:92a-46: bor nas nub kyi zla gam tshad //
T02TD2582E:92a-47: phyi rol ka ba nang gi cha //
T02TD2582E:92a-48: cha bran bcu drug zla ba'i dbyibs //
T02TD2582E:92a-49: de nas nang gi cha dbye ba //
T02TD2582E:92a-50: gtso bo'i cha gnyis gdung cha gcig //
T02TD2582E:92a-51: lhag ma lha snam bcu bzhi'i gnas //
T02TD2582E:92a-52: padma gar dbang po brang ni //
T02TD2582E:92b-0: gtso bo'i cha gsum @92b gdung cha gcig / nang gi phyogs bzhir cha drug yin //
T02TD2582E:92b-1: phyi yi phyogs bzhir cha bdun te //
T02TD2582E:92b-2: rdo rje ra ba gong dang mtshungs //
T02TD2582E:92b-3: rdo rje nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang //
T02TD2582E:92b-4: rta mchog don yod grub pa yi //
T02TD2582E:92b-5: dkyil 'khor thig kyang gong ma bzhin //
T02TD2582E:92b-6: cha bgo ba ni mthun pa yin //
T02TD2582E:92b-7: zhes bstan pa shes rab dang ldan pas thig gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2582E:92b-8: seng ldeng gi phur pa la brtod pa'i srad bus nang gi dkyil 'khor phyi'i rdo rje'i phreng ba dbang ldan gyi phyogs nas brtsams te //
T02TD2582E:92b-10: dkyil 'khor gyi tshad ni nyis 'gyur du bya'o //
T02TD2582E:92b-12: sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor zlum po ste /
T02TD2582E:92b-16: rin chen la yang rin chen nyid //
T02TD2582E:92b-17: las kyi rigs la sna tshogs pa'i //
T02TD2582E:92b-18: rdo rje nyid ni yin par 'dod //
T02TD2582E:92b-19: thig 'debs pa'i dus su sngags 'di brjod cing gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2582E:92b-20: aom badzra sa ma ya m'a ti kra ma h'um 'di ni thig gdab pa'i cho ga'o //
T02TD2582E:92b-21: de nas tshon gyi las bshad de //
T02TD2582E:92b-22: sngon po dang ser po dang dmar po dang ljang gu dang dkar po rnams rim pa bzhin du h'um tr'am hr'i: aa: aom las stong pa sngon du 'gro ba las yi ge lnga bskyed la de nas rang bzhin gyi gnas nas de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i thugs ka nas yi ge 'bru lnga spyan drangs nas gnyis su med par bstim mo //
T02TD2582E:92b-23: aom badzra sa ma ya dza: tsitta h'um zhes pa'i sngags bzlas pas ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin du sbyang bar bya'o //
T02TD2582E:92b-24: de nas tshon dgye ba brtsam par bya ste /
T02TD2582E:92b-25: g-yon pa rdo rje khu tshur gyis //
T02TD2582E:92b-26: dbang ldan mtshams nas dgye byas la //
T02TD2582E:92b-27: phyi nang kun du slob ma yis //
T02TD2582E:92b-28: zhes bya ba ni dkar po nas drangs te /
T02TD2582E:92b-29: mdzub gang bla ma'i lag pa g-yon pas bris nas ngag tu 'di skad brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2582E:92b-30: chos dbyings de dag gnas pas na //
T02TD2582E:92b-31: sems can khams ni rab grol byed //
T02TD2582E:92b-32: rgyal ba 'jam pa'i rdo rje nyid //
T02TD2582E:92b-33: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas /
T02TD2582E:92b-34: zhes brjod pas phur bu gdon par bya'o //
T02TD2582E:92b-35: shar phyogs su ni sngon po ste //
T02TD2582E:92b-36: lhor ni ser po yang dag ldan //
T02TD2582E:92b-37: nub ni padma r'a ga ste //
T02TD2582E:92b-38: ljang gu byang du yin par 'dod //
T02TD2582E:92b-39: dbus kyis yi cha nyid ni //
T02TD2582E:92b-40: shel ldan snang ba bla na med //
T02TD2582E:92b-41: sngon po rdo rje rtse rang bzhin //
T02TD2582E:92b-42: gnyis pa gser la dmigs pa ste //
T02TD2582E:92b-43: padma chags pa'i ngo bo gzhi //
T02TD2582E:92b-44: de bzhin gshegs ni mar kata 'dra //
T02TD2582E:93a-0: @93a * // dkar po nang du shes bya ste //
T02TD2582E:93a-1: 'di ni tshon gyi rim par grags //
T02TD2582E:93a-3: rtse gcig tu bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2582E:93a-4: de ltar bris la lha dgod pa ni dbus su rnam par snang mdzad do //
T02TD2582E:93a-5: 'khor lo'i rtsibs bzhi la ni rigs bzhi'o //
T02TD2582E:93a-6: gru chad bzhi la yum bzhi'o//
T02TD2582E:93a-7: de'i phyi rol du 'khor lo rtsibs bcu drug la rdo rje sems dpa' sku mdog dkar po //
T02TD2582E:93a-13: rgyal mtshan nam mkha'i mdog can //
T02TD2582E:93a-18: smra ba zangs kyi mdog can //
T02TD2582E:93a-19: rdo rje las sna tshogs pa'i mdog can //
T02TD2582E:93a-20: rdo rje srung ba ser po //
T02TD2582E:93a-21: rdo rje gnod sbyin nag po //
T02TD2582E:93a-22: rdo rje khu tshur ser ljang /
T02TD2582E:93a-23: nang gi gru chad bzhi la sgeg mo dkar mo /
T02TD2582E:93a-27: de nas phyi'i lha mo bzhi ni bdug pa ma sku mdog dkar mo /
T02TD2582E:93a-30: byug pa ma ljang gu sgo bzhir sgo ba rnams dgod par bya'o //
T02TD2582E:93a-31: de nas dkyil 'khor phyi ma la byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' bcu drug khyams su dgod par bya ste /
T02TD2582E:93a-32: de'ang shar phyogs pa rnams ni sku mdog dkar mo rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsnams pa /
T02TD2582E:93a-33: lho phyogs pa rnams ni sku mdog ser po ratna bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2582E:93a-34: nub phyogs pa rnams ni sku mdog dmar po padma bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2582E:93a-35: byang phyogs pa rnams ni sku mdog ljang gu sna tshogs rdo rje rgya gram bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2582E:93a-36: de nas sgo bzhir sgo ma lcags kyu ma dkar mo /
T02TD2582E:93a-40: de'i phyi rol gyi khyams la rim pa dang po la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs sku mdog dkar po 'khor lo dang ral gri bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2582E:93a-41: rim pa gnyis pa la rdo rje'i rigs sngon po rdo rje dang ral gri bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2582E:93a-42: rim pa gsum pa la padma'i rigs dmar po padma dang ral gri bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2582E:93a-43: rim pa bzhi pa la rin po che'i rigs ser po rin po che dang ral gri bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2582E:93a-44: rim pa lnga pa la las kyi rigs ljang gu sna tshogs rdo rje dang ral gri bsnams pa /
T02TD2582E:93b-0: thams cad @93b gdan padma dang zla ba la bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD2582E:93b-1: rigs so sor phye ba'i lha rnams lnga ru phye la dgod par bya'o //
T02TD2582E:93b-2: 'khor lo rim gsum ldan pa la //
T02TD2582E:93b-3: snam bu mu khyud rnams kyis brgyan //
T02TD2582E:93b-4: dkyil 'khor gyi ni phyi rim du //
T02TD2582E:93b-5: ji skad gsungs pa'i rgyan rnams bri //
T02TD2582E:93b-6: de ni dkyil 'khor bri ba'i rim pa'o //
T02TD2582E:93b-7: de nas phyi dro'i dus su yo byad dang dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan rnams dgram par bya ste /
T02TD2582E:93b-8: mchod pa'i yo byad thams cad dang /
T02TD2582E:93b-9: de bzhin du phur pa dang mda' dang /
T02TD2582E:93b-11: tshon skud kyi dra ba dang /
T02TD2582E:93b-12: me long la sogs pas dkyil 'khor brgyan la /
T02TD2582E:93b-13: phyogs dang mtshams rnams su brgyad gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD2582E:93b-14: dri zhim pa'i chus khrus byas la gos gtsang ma bgos la rdo rje dang dril bu rab tu bskul zhing rje btsun gyi yi ge brgya pa bzlas shing dkyil 'khor de dbang ldan gyi mtshams nas brtsams nas lan bdun du bskor ba byas pas lhag pa dang ma tshang ba skor bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2582E:93b-15: de nas bum pa rnams gnas gnas su bzhag ste //
T02TD2582E:93b-16: rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa ni dbus su gzhag go //
T02TD2582E:93b-17: las thams cad pa'i bum pa ni bsang gtor bya ba'i phyir dkyil 'khor gyi g-yas phyogs su gzhag go //
T02TD2582E:93b-18: gzhan ma rnams ni me'i mtshams su gzhag go / slob dpon stan nang tshangs can la 'dug la dkyil 'khor bsgrub par bya ste /
T02TD2582E:93b-19: 'khor lo dang po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bar du bsgoms la bzlas pa'i rnal 'byor rdzogs pa dang ras zung du sbyar la lha rnams la aom a'a: h'um: badzra wa stra h'um zhes bya bas dbul lo //
T02TD2582E:93b-20: de nas sgrub pa'i grogs mchog dkyil 'khor du bzhag la bdag nyid phyir byung la gtor ma 'jig rten pa'i 'byung po la gtang ngo /
T02TD2582E:93b-21: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi shar phyogs su sbyin sreg gis dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams mnyes par byas la /
T02TD2582E:93b-22: de nas bdag nyid 'jug pa'i cho ga dang /
T02TD2582E:93b-23: slob ma 'jug pa'i cho ga yang tshul bzhin du bya'o //
T02TD2582E:93b-24: de ni dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa'i rim pa'o //
T02TD2582E:93b-25: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha la phyag byas la gnang ba nod par bya ste //
T02TD2582E:93b-26: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas ni //
T02TD2582E:93b-27: rdo rje slob dpon dka' thub che //
T02TD2582E:93b-28: sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir //
T02TD2582E:93b-29: slob ma rnams ni 'jug par gsol //
T02TD2582E:93b-30: de nas slob ma yol ba'i phyi rol du bzhag la bum pa'i chus bsang gtor byas la aom ya m'anta ka h'um phat /
T02TD2582E:94a-2: gdong g-yogs bcings la me tog gi phreng ba bzung ste /
T02TD2582E:94a-4: bu khyod dngos grub ci la dga' //
T02TD2582E:94a-7: skal bzang bde mchog bdag dga'o //
T02TD2582E:94a-9: de nas slob ma thams cad kyis //
T02TD2582E:94a-10: dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa po //
T02TD2582E:94a-11: slob dpon nyid ni bdag la dgongs //
T02TD2582E:94a-12: byang chub sems dpa'i lam bstan pa //
T02TD2582E:94a-13: skyob pa chen po bdag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2582E:94a-14: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te //
T02TD2582E:94a-15: skyabs gsum yongs la skyabs 'gro bas //
T02TD2582E:94a-16: thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu //
T02TD2582E:94a-17: mgon po bdag ni 'jug par mdzod //
T02TD2582E:94a-20: bu khyod tshur shog theg chen gyi //
T02TD2582E:94a-21: lam chen snod ni khyod yin te //
T02TD2582E:94a-22: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang 'das dang //
T02TD2582E:94a-23: de bzhin gang dag ma byon dang //
T02TD2582E:94a-24: da ltar byung ba'i rdzogs sangs rgyas //
T02TD2582E:94a-25: de dag kun gyis gsang sngags kyi //
T02TD2582E:94a-26: cho ga zab mo 'di mkhyen pa //
T02TD2582E:94a-29: de bas kun mkhyen thob bya'i phyir //
T02TD2582E:94a-30: bu yis blo gros 'di gyis shig / de nas rgyun bshags bya ste //
T02TD2582E:94a-31: dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2582E:94a-32: dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi //
T02TD2582E:94a-33: sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags //
T02TD2582E:94a-34: bsod nams kun la rjes yi rang //
T02TD2582E:94a-35: sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyis gzung /
T02TD2582E:94a-36: byang chub mchog gi sems ni bdag gis bskyed //
T02TD2582E:94a-37: sems can rnams ni bdag gis mgron du gnyer //
T02TD2582E:94a-38: 'gro la phan phyir sangs rgyas 'grub par shog / ces brjod du gzhug go //
T02TD2582E:94a-39: de nas 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2582E:94a-40: gtso bo bdag la sdom pa stsol //
T02TD2582E:94a-41: thub pa'i nyi ma ma lus pa //
T02TD2582E:94a-42: mi ldog pa yi dbang bskur ba //
T02TD2582E:94a-43: slob dpon chen po bdag la stsol //
T02TD2582E:94a-44: de nas slob dpon gyis rigs thams cad la gsol ba gdab par bya ste /
T02TD2582E:94a-45: che ge mo zhes bya ba 'di /
T02TD2582E:94a-46: byang chub sems ni yongs 'dzin pa //
T02TD2582E:94a-47: dam tshig sdom pa gsang ba yi //
T02TD2582E:94a-49: yang slob dpon gyis 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2582E:94a-50: gsang ba chen po'i rigs dag la //
T02TD2582E:94b-0: @94b gsang ba yongs su 'dzin par ni //
T02TD2582E:94b-1: bdag nyid chen po khyod 'dod dam //
T02TD2582E:94b-2: des kyang 'tshal zhes brjod par bya //
T02TD2582E:94b-3: yang slob dpon gyis 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2582E:94b-4: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te //
T02TD2582E:94b-5: dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su gsol //
T02TD2582E:94b-6: 'di ni sangs rgyas rigs dag pa'i //
T02TD2582E:94b-7: dam tshig bstan par gyur pa'o //
T02TD2582E:94b-8: rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya yang //
T02TD2582E:94b-9: blo chen khyod kyis gzung bar gyis //
T02TD2582E:94b-10: byang chub sems gang de rdo rje //
T02TD2582E:94b-11: shes rab dril bu zhes brjod do //
T02TD2582E:94b-12: slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar gyis //
T02TD2582E:94b-13: bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam //
T02TD2582E:94b-14: 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs dag pa'i //
T02TD2582E:94b-15: dam tshig sdom pa yin par gsungs //
T02TD2582E:94b-16: rin chen rigs mchog chen po la //
T02TD2582E:94b-17: nyin dang mtshan du lan gsum du //
T02TD2582E:94b-18: zang zing mi 'jigs chos dang byams //
T02TD2582E:94b-19: sbyin pa rnams bzhi rtag tu sbyin //
T02TD2582E:94b-20: phyi nang gsang ba'i theg pa gsum //
T02TD2582E:94b-21: dam pa'i chos kyang gsungs par bya //
T02TD2582E:94b-23: dam tshig sdom pa yin par gsungs //
T02TD2582E:94b-24: las kyi rigs mchog chen po la //
T02TD2582E:94b-25: sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni //
T02TD2582E:94b-26: yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi //
T02TD2582E:94b-27: mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bgyi //
T02TD2582E:94b-28: de las gzhan pa bcu bzhi ni //
T02TD2582E:94b-29: phas pham pa ni rab tu bshad //
T02TD2582E:94b-30: spang zhing ngor bar mi bya ste //
T02TD2582E:94b-31: rtsa ba'i ltung ba zhes bshad do //
T02TD2582E:94b-32: nyin dang mtshan mo lan gsum du //
T02TD2582E:94b-33: nyin re bzhin du bzlas par bya //
T02TD2582E:94b-35: kha na ma tho sbom por 'gyur //
T02TD2582E:94b-36: khyod kyis srog chags gsad mi bya //
T02TD2582E:94b-37: ma byin par yang mi blang ngo //
T02TD2582E:94b-38: 'dod pa log par mi spyod do //
T02TD2582E:94b-39: brdzun ni smra bar mi bya'o //
T02TD2582E:94b-40: phung khrol kun gyi rtsa ba ni //
T02TD2582E:94b-41: chang ni rnam par spang bar bya //
T02TD2582E:94b-42: sems can 'dul phyir ma gtogs pa //
T02TD2582E:94b-43: bya ba ma yin thams cad spang //
T02TD2582E:94b-44: dam pa nye bar bsten bya zhing //
T02TD2582E:94b-45: rnal 'byor pa rnams bsnyen bkur bya //
T02TD2582E:94b-46: lus kyi las ni rnam pa gsum //
T02TD2582E:94b-47: ngag gi rnam pa bzhi rnams dang /
T02TD2582E:94b-48: yid kyi rnam pa gsum dag ni //
T02TD2582E:94b-49: ci nus par ni rjes su srungs //
T02TD2582E:94b-50: theg pa dman la 'dod mi bya //
T02TD2582E:94b-51: sems can don la rgyab phyogs min //
T02TD2582E:94b-52: 'khor ba dag kyang yong mi spang //
T02TD2582E:94b-53: rtag tu mya ngan 'da' mi bya //
T02TD2582E:94b-54: lha dang lha min gsang ba pa //
T02TD2582E:94b-55: khyod kyis brnyas par mi bya zhing //
T02TD2582E:95a-3: 'di dag dam tshig yin par bshad //
T02TD2582E:95a-4: khyod kyis rtag tu bsrung bar bya //
T02TD2582E:95a-5: des kyang 'di skad brjod par bya ste //
T02TD2582E:95a-6: slob dpon 'dir ni bdag la stsol //
T02TD2582E:95a-7: gtso bos ji skad bka' stsal pa //
T02TD2582E:95a-8: de ltar bdag gis 'tshal bar bgyi //
T02TD2582E:95a-9: ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams //
T02TD2582E:95a-10: byang chub tu ni nges mdzad pa'i //
T02TD2582E:95a-13: ces pa'i bar du brjod do //
T02TD2582E:95a-14: gang zhig sdom pa 'dzin par mi byed pa de la ni slob dpon du rjes su gnang ba dang /
T02TD2582E:95a-15: dbang bskur bar mi bya'i 'jug pa tsam cig byed du gzhug go //
T02TD2582E:95a-16: de nas bo dhi tsitta au tp'a da y'a mi zhes bya bas byang chub tu sems bskyed de //
T02TD2582E:95a-17: de nas me tog dang bcas pa'i rdo rje snying gar bzhag la //
T02TD2582E:95a-18: aom su ra ta sa ma yastvam ho badzra si ddhi sa ma ya su kham /
T02TD2582E:95a-19: dus 'di nyid du khyod nyid ni //
T02TD2582E:95a-20: sangs rgyas rigs su chud pas na //
T02TD2582E:95a-21: tshul 'di gzhan la ma brjod cig / gal te smras par gyur na ni //
T02TD2582E:95a-22: 'jam pa'i rdo rje rab khros nas //
T02TD2582E:95a-24: de nas tsandan dang gur kum la sogs pa'i chu khyor bar blugs te /
T02TD2582E:95a-25: 'di ni khyod kyis dmyal ba'i chu //
T02TD2582E:95a-27: gal te gsang sngags dngos grub ni //
T02TD2582E:95a-29: aom badzra au da ka tha tha /
T02TD2582E:95a-31: deng nas brtsams te bu khyod kyi //
T02TD2582E:95a-33: nga yis ji ltar bka' stsal pa //
T02TD2582E:95a-34: khyod kyis skyo ba med par gyis //
T02TD2582E:95a-35: gang yang la mos med pa //
T02TD2582E:95a-36: de bzhin mos par ma byas na /
T02TD2582E:95a-37: bdud kyis bcom nas dmyal bar 'gro //
T02TD2582E:95a-38: de bas dam tshig la gnas kyis //
T02TD2582E:95a-39: 'di ni dam tshig chu bo'i cho ga'o //
T02TD2582E:95a-40: de nas slob ma yol ba'i nang du bkug la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlobs la 'jam pa'i rdo rje bdag la dbab tu gsol zhes gsol ba btab la slob ma'i snying gar aa: bsams la 'di skad ces brjod de /
T02TD2582E:95a-41: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis rlobs la /
T02TD2582E:95a-42: ye shes 'bab par gyur cig ces brjod do //
T02TD2582E:95b-0: de nas rkang pa'i @95b mthil du yam las rlung gi dkyil 'khor ba dan gyis mtshan pa spyi bor aom las 'od zer spros pas rkang pa g-yon pa g-yas pas mnan la /
T02TD2582E:95b-1: kun tu dril bu'i sgra yang dag par dkrol zhing dbab //
T02TD2582E:95b-2: badzra a'a be sha aa a'a: zhes lan brgya rtsa brgyad la sogs pa brjod la dbab po //
T02TD2582E:95b-3: ye shes babs pa dang 'phar na tishtha badzra zhes brtan par bya'o //
T02TD2582E:95b-4: sku gsung thugs kyi rtags gsum 'byung ste /
T02TD2582E:95b-5: sku babs na gar dang gar gyi lan bya'o gsung babs na sngags smra'o //
T02TD2582E:95b-6: thugs babs na de kho na nyid kyi don shes par bya'o //
T02TD2582E:95b-7: 'di ni ye shes dbab pa'i cho ga'o //
T02TD2582E:95b-8: des phebs par ma gyur na rdo rje bsdams pa las rdo rje sems ma'i phyag rgya dral bar bya zhing /
T02TD2582E:95b-9: badzra satva aa aa aa zhes brjod pas bdag sum brtsegs pa'i thugs ka'i yig 'bru las 'od zer dpag tu med pa 'phros pa byung ste sdig sgrib bya sgro la me phog pa ltar choms choms bsregs te dag par bsam zhing sgra drag po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so //
T02TD2582E:95b-10: des kyang ma phebs na sdig pa sbyong ba'i sbyin sreg bya /
T02TD2582E:95b-11: des mi phebs pa mi srid do //
T02TD2582E:95b-13: dkyil 'khor du ni legs bcug nas //
T02TD2582E:95b-14: lha yi rigs kyi rim pa dang //
T02TD2582E:95b-17: zhes brjod la mig gi snang ba dri bar bya'o //
T02TD2582E:95b-18: dkar po la sogs pa zhi ba'i dngos grub rnams su shes par bya'o //
T02TD2582E:95b-20: rigs ni gang gi snod du gyur //
T02TD2582E:95b-21: bsod nams mthu ni gang yod pa //
T02TD2582E:95b-23: prat'i tstsha badzra ho: zhes bya ba 'dis me tog gi phreng ba dkyil 'khor du dor bar bya'o //
T02TD2582E:95b-24: dbul babs na ni mchog gi dngos grub thob po //
T02TD2582E:95b-25: zhabs la babs na sngags grub /
T02TD2582E:95b-26: stod dang smad dang bar dang gsum du babs na /
T02TD2582E:95b-27: dngos grub rab 'bring tha ma gsum du shes par bya'o //
T02TD2582E:95b-28: gal te ri mo'i nang du ma lhung na ni bskyar ro //
T02TD2582E:95b-29: lan gsum bskyar nas phyi rol du song na dngos grub med par shes par bya'o //
T02TD2582E:95b-30: de nas phreng ba blang la 'di skad brjod do //
T02TD2582E:95b-31: aom pra ti grihna tvam ai mam satva ma h'a ba la zhes brjod pas mgo la bcing ngo //
T02TD2582E:95b-32: de ni phreng ba dor ba'i cho ga'o //
T02TD2582E:95b-33: de nas gdong g-yogs dgrol te /
T02TD2582E:95b-34: rdo rje chags pa deng khyod kyi //
T02TD2582E:96a-1: dbye ba la brtson par mdzad //
T02TD2582E:96a-2: phye bas thams cad mthong 'gyur te //
T02TD2582E:96a-3: rdo rje'i mig ni bla na med //
T02TD2582E:96a-4: he badzra pa shya zhes pas so //
T02TD2582E:96a-5: gdong g-yogs bkrol la dkyil 'khor bstan te /
T02TD2582E:96a-6: thar pa chen po'i grod khyer mchog //
T02TD2582E:96a-7: ltos shig ltos shig sems dpa' che //
T02TD2582E:96a-8: me tog gang la lhung gyur ba //
T02TD2582E:96a-9: de ni khyod kyi 'jam dbyangs yin //
T02TD2582E:96a-11: de dkyil 'khor blta ru bcug la sgo srungs nas brtsams nas gtso bo'i bar du ming brjod la bstan par bya ste dkyil 'khor da gzhug pa'i cho ga'o /
T02TD2582E:96a-13: // / de nas dngos grub thob par bya ba'i phyir rdo rje slob dpon la rjes su mthun pa'i yon phul la /
T02TD2582E:96a-14: byang chub rdo rje sangs rgyas la //
T02TD2582E:96a-15: mchod chen ji ltar stsol ba bzhin //
T02TD2582E:96a-16: bdag kyang rab tu bskyab pa'i phyir //
T02TD2582E:96a-17: nam mkha' rdo rje deng bdag stsol //
T02TD2582E:96a-19: slob dpon gyis kyang de la dbang bskur bar bya ba'i phyir sgrub pa po dang rdo rje slob dbon du dbang bskur ba sbyin pa ni dang po sgrub pa po'i dbang bskur te /
T02TD2582E:96a-20: shar ngos su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du slob ma yi dam gyi lhar bskyed la /
T02TD2582E:96a-21: yi ge gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs la /
T02TD2582E:96a-22: steng du yi ge bris la las thams cad pa'i bum pas dbang bskur la mchod pa lngas de la /
T02TD2582E:96a-23: mchod la gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan la sogs pa dang dung dang rol mo la sogs pa'i sgra rnams kyis mchod par bya'o //
T02TD2582E:96a-24: de nas bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa la sogs pas mngon par dga' bar bya zhing /
T02TD2582E:96a-25: dang por re zhig chu'i dbang bskur te /
T02TD2582E:96a-26: bum pa'i dbang bskur ba ni dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bum pa'i chu rnams rnam rgyal gyi bum par nyud [*nyung?] zad re blugs la /
T02TD2582E:96a-27: de nas slob ma'i dbang bskur sbyin te /
T02TD2582E:96a-28: aom manydzu shr'i aa p+hi shinytsa h'um /
T02TD2582E:96a-29: zhes pas dbang bskur te rigs kyi bdag pos dbu brgyan par bya'o //
T02TD2582E:96a-30: de nas cod pan gyi dbang bskur bar bya ste /
T02TD2582E:96a-31: de nas dbu rgyan stong ba nyid sngon du 'gro bas bh'um aom hr'i: a'a: h'um las rigs lngar bskyed la ye shes sems dpa' dgug gzhug byas la slob ma'i mgo la bskon la /
T02TD2582E:96a-32: aom ratna mu ku ta aa bhi shinytsa zhes pas dbu rgyan dang /
T02TD2582E:96a-33: dar dpyangs dang bcas pas dbang bskur ro //
T02TD2582E:96b-0: de nas rdo rje stong pa nyid @96b las 'od dpag tu med par bskyed la ye shes sems dpa' bcug la de rdo rjer gyur par bsams la /
T02TD2582E:96b-1: rdo rje rtse lnga pa khu tshur g-yas bas snying gar bzung la /
T02TD2582E:96b-2: sangs rgyas kun gyi rdo rje'i dbang //
T02TD2582E:96b-3: de ring khyod la bskur bar bya //
T02TD2582E:96b-4: sangs rgyas kun tu rab bsgrub phyir //
T02TD2582E:96b-5: rdo rje 'di ni khyod kyis long //
T02TD2582E:96b-6: aom badzra aa dhi ba dhi stva aa bhi shanyts'a mi tishtha badzra sa ma ya h'um zhes bya bas lag pa g-yas par sbyin no //
T02TD2582E:96b-7: snang ba mtha' yas kyi rang bzhin rdo rje'i dbang ngo //
T02TD2582E:96b-8: de nas dril bu don yod grub par bskyed la ye shes sems dpa' bcug la dril bur gyur par bsams la /
T02TD2582E:96b-9: lag pa g-yon par byin la /
T02TD2582E:96b-10: aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarba ddha rmm'a n'a a'a dya nuta banna tv'ata ces pas sbyin no //
T02TD2582E:96b-11: dril bu'i rang bzhin bdag po'i dbang ngo //
T02TD2582E:96b-12: de nas rdo rje dril bu slob ma'i spyi bor bzhag la ming gi dbang rnam par snang mdzad chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin du sbyin no //
T02TD2582E:96b-13: aom badzra satva stvam aa bhi shinyts'a mi badzra n'a ma aa bhi she ga ta /
T02TD2582E:96b-14: kye dpal rdo rje che ge mo zhes sngar lha gang la babs pa'i zhabs kyis mtshon pa'i ming sbyin no //
T02TD2582E:96b-15: 'di ni rtag pa'i rang bzhin ming gi dbang ngo //
T02TD2582E:96b-16: de nas de la p'u dza lngas mchod la dga' ba mnyes par bya'o //
T02TD2582E:96b-17: de nas de'i rjes la slob mas bla ma la yon dbul ba la sogs par bya'o //
T02TD2582E:96b-18: dbang bskur ba lnga po de dag gis rgyud la sogs pa nyan pa dang /
T02TD2582E:96b-19: bshad pa dang sgrub pa po'i snod du 'gyur te /
T02TD2582E:96b-20: go rims bzhin du me long lta bu dang mnyam pa nyid dang so sor rtog pa dang /
T02TD2582E:96b-21: bya ba grub pa dang chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes rnams so //
T02TD2582E:96b-22: dbang lnga po 'di dag ni rigs lnga'i dbang ngo //
T02TD2582E:96b-23: yang na dbang 'di yang ma rig ba las bzlog pas na rig pa'i dbang ngo //
T02TD2582E:96b-24: 'di ni rig pa'i dbang bskur pa'i cho ga'o /
T02TD2582E:96b-26: // / de nas slob dpon du 'os pa'i slob mas yon phul la gsol ba gdab po //
T02TD2582E:96b-27: bdag dang gzhan don byed pas na //
T02TD2582E:96b-28: mi ldog pa yi dbang bskur ba //
T02TD2582E:96b-29: thugs rje'i bdag po bdag la stsol //
T02TD2582E:96b-30: zhes gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2582E:96b-31: de nas slob ma rnam par snang mdzad du bskyed la shar ngos su dbang stegs gru bzhi pa sgo nub tu bstan ba'i dbus su tshon sna lngas padma 'dab brgyad bris la /
T02TD2582E:96b-32: de'i steng du seng ge'i khri la bzhag la /
T02TD2582E:97a-2: g-yas phyogs su gdugs dkar po gser gyi yu ba can yongs su bzung la /
T02TD2582E:97a-3: g-yon phyogs su rgyal mtshan dang ba dang bsgreng la rnga po che dang /
T02TD2582E:97a-4: zangs kyi dung dang 'bud dung la sogs pa'i sgras nam mkha' gang bar byas la /
T02TD2582E:97a-5: rdo rje dang dril bu dkrol zhing / phun sum tshogs pa mnga' ba gser gyi ri po 'dra //
T02TD2582E:97a-6: 'jig rten gsum gyi mgon po dri ma gsum spangs pa //
T02TD2582E:97a-7: sangs rgyas padma rgyas pa 'dab 'dra'i zhal mnga' ba //
T02TD2582E:97a-8: bkra shis de yis khyod la deng 'dir zhi byed shog / de yis nye bar bstan pa'i mchog rab mi g-yo ba //
T02TD2582E:97a-9: 'jig rten gsum du grab sa shing lha dang mis mchod pa //
T02TD2582E:97a-10: chos kyi dam pa skye dgu rnams la zhi byed pa //
T02TD2582E:97a-11: de ni 'jig rten dge ba'i bkra shis gnyis pa'o //
T02TD2582E:97a-12: dge 'dun dam pa chos ldan thos pa'i bkra shis phyug //
T02TD2582E:97a-13: mi dang lha dang ma yin gyis mchod pa'i gnas //
T02TD2582E:97a-14: tshogs kyi dam pa ngo tsha shes dang dpal gyi gzhi //
T02TD2582E:97a-15: de ni 'jig rten dge ba'i bkra shis gsum pa'o //
T02TD2582E:97a-16: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i bkra shis kyi klu blangs la nam mkha' gang ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis dbang bskur bar bsams la /
T02TD2582E:97a-17: rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa nas bzung la sgo ba'i bar du bskur la /
T02TD2582E:97a-18: de nas 'jam dpal gyi sku gzugs slob ma'i spyi bor bzhag la /
T02TD2582E:97a-19: aom manyadzu shr'i ma h'a su kha badzra satva /
T02TD2582E:97a-20: dza: h'um hom ho: su ra te sa ma ya stvam /
T02TD2582E:97a-21: de ring rdo rje slob dpon gyur //
T02TD2582E:97a-22: slob ma'i tshogs rnams bsdu bar gyis //
T02TD2582E:97a-24: slob ma la gnang ba spyin no //
T02TD2582E:97a-25: de nas dam tshig gsum gyi dbang sbyin par bya ste /
T02TD2582E:97a-26: h'um las rdo rje bsgoms la /
T02TD2582E:97a-27: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis //
T02TD2582E:97a-28: 'jam pa'i rdo rje phyag na gnas //
T02TD2582E:97a-29: khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu zungs //
T02TD2582E:97a-30: 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i brtul shugs brtan //
T02TD2582E:97a-31: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta si ddhi badzra sa ma ya tishatha ae sha strvam dha ra ya mi hi hi hi hi h'um zhes bya ba 'dis slob ma la gtad la /
T02TD2582E:97a-32: de kho na nyid 'di brjod do //
T02TD2582E:97a-33: thog ma med pa'i sems dpa' la //
T02TD2582E:97a-34: 'jam pa'i rdo rje dga' ba che //
T02TD2582E:97a-35: kun du bzang po thams cad bdag / rdo rje snying po'i bdag po'i gtso //
T02TD2582E:97b-0: bcom ldan 'das dpal @97b mchog dang po'i skyes bu'o //
T02TD2582E:97b-2: de nas aa las dril bu bskyed la /
T02TD2582E:97b-3: 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02TD2582E:97b-4: shes rab dbyangs kyi rjes 'gror brjod //
T02TD2582E:97b-5: khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang //
T02TD2582E:97b-6: byang chub mchog tu rgyal ba bzhed //
T02TD2582E:97b-7: ces bya ba 'dis slob ma'i lag pa g-yon du dril bu byin la /
T02TD2582E:97b-8: srid pa'i rang bzhin dag pa'i phyir //
T02TD2582E:97b-9: rang bzhin gyis ni dngos bral byas //
T02TD2582E:97b-10: rang bzhin dag pa'i sems ldan pa //
T02TD2582E:97b-11: srid pa dag pa'i mchog tu byed //
T02TD2582E:97b-12: ces bya ba 'dis chos kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya ste /
T02TD2582E:97b-13: aom badzra ghanta a'a: zhes bzlas so //
T02TD2582E:97b-14: de nas slob ma'i lag pa gnyis kyis rdo rje dang dril bu snying gar bsnol la //
T02TD2582E:97b-15: lha'i sku phyag rgya chen por bsgoms la //
T02TD2582E:97b-16: srid pa'i bde ba shin tu chung //
T02TD2582E:97b-17: sdug bsngal chen po dag bya'i phyir //
T02TD2582E:97b-18: shin tu bde ba dam pa'i thabs //
T02TD2582E:97b-19: de bas dam tshig bsrung bar gyis //
T02TD2582E:97b-20: 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad ni //
T02TD2582E:97b-21: ci 'dod pa ni bsten bzhin du //
T02TD2582E:97b-22: rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis //
T02TD2582E:97b-23: bdag dang gzhan la mchod par gyis //
T02TD2582E:97b-24: 'di ni sku yi dam tshig go //
T02TD2582E:97b-25: de nas slob ma la mchod pa lngas mchod la /
T02TD2582E:97b-26: de'i 'og tu gser gyi thur ma blangs la //
T02TD2582E:97b-27: ji ltar mig mkhan rgyal po yis //
T02TD2582E:97b-28: 'jig rten ling tog bsal ba ltar //
T02TD2582E:97b-29: bu khyod kyis ni mi shes pa'i //
T02TD2582E:97b-30: ling tog rgyal ba rnams kyis bsal //
T02TD2582E:97b-31: aom badzra ne tra aa pa ha ra pa ta lam hri zhes bya bas mig la byugs te dag par bya'o //
T02TD2582E:97b-32: de nas me long blangs la chos kyi snying po de kho na nyid bstan te /
T02TD2582E:97b-33: chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste /
T02TD2582E:97b-34: gsal zhing dag la rnyog pa med //
T02TD2582E:97b-35: gzung du med cing brjod du med //
T02TD2582E:97b-36: rgyu dang las las kun du 'byung //
T02TD2582E:97b-37: rang bzhin med cing bdag med pa //
T02TD2582E:97b-38: de ltar chos rnams shes byas nas //
T02TD2582E:97b-39: sems can don ni mnyam med byos //
T02TD2582E:97b-40: 'on kyang sangs rgyas sras su skye //
T02TD2582E:97b-41: de nas a'a: las bskyed pa'i dril bu byin te /
T02TD2582E:97b-42: chos rnams nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de //
T02TD2582E:97b-43: nam mkha' la yang mtshan nyid med //
T02TD2582E:97b-44: nam mkha' dang ni mnyam sbyor pas //
T02TD2582E:97b-45: kun mchog mnyam pa nyid du gsal //
T02TD2582E:97b-46: zhes bya bas dkrol bar bya'o //
T02TD2582E:97b-47: de nas mda' gzhu'i dbang bskur sbyin par bya ste /
T02TD2582E:97b-48: ho zhes bya bas mda' gzhu byin la /
T02TD2582E:98a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rjes su @98a * //
T02TD2582E:98a-2: logs bzhi steng 'og tu mda' re 'phen du gzhug go //
T02TD2582E:98a-3: yang me long gi dbang sbyin par bya ste /
T02TD2582E:98a-4: aom manydzu shr'i zhes bya bas me long bstan la /
T02TD2582E:98a-5: 'jam pa'i rdo rje me long ltar //
T02TD2582E:98a-6: dag cing gsal la rnyog pa med //
T02TD2582E:98a-7: sangs rgyas kun dag rang bzhin gyis //
T02TD2582E:98a-8: bu khyod kyi ni snying la zhugs //
T02TD2582E:98a-9: 'jam pa'i rdo rje rang nyid gtso //
T02TD2582E:98a-10: 'di nyid yin par shes par gyis //
T02TD2582E:98a-13: // / de nas rjes gnang sbyin par bya ste /
T02TD2582E:98a-14: aom badzra hi tu zhes bya bas 'khor lo rkang ba'i bar du bzhag la /
T02TD2582E:98a-15: aom badzra bh'a sha ram zhes bya bas lag pa g-yas su dung byin la /
T02TD2582E:98a-16: lag pa g-yon par a'a: zhes bya bas mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i po ti byin la /
T02TD2582E:98a-17: dril bu yang byin la dkrol zhing / de ring phan chad 'jig rten la //
T02TD2582E:98a-18: skyob pa rnams kyis 'khor lo bskor //
T02TD2582E:98a-19: chos kyi dung ni bla med pas //
T02TD2582E:98a-20: kun du ma lus gang bar gyis //
T02TD2582E:98a-21: som nyi yid gnyis mi bya zhing //
T02TD2582E:98a-22: dogs pa med pa'i sems kyis ni //
T02TD2582E:98a-23: gsang sngags spyod pa'i tshul gyi mchog /'jig rten rnams la rab tu sgrol //
T02TD2582E:98a-24: de ltar byas na sangs rgyas la //
T02TD2582E:98a-26: rdo rje 'dzin pa de kun yang //
T02TD2582E:98a-27: khyod la rtag tu srung bar byed //
T02TD2582E:98a-28: de nas gnang ba sbyin par bya ste //
T02TD2582E:98a-29: so so'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2582E:98a-30: lo ka kun la khyad par du //
T02TD2582E:98a-31: sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir //
T02TD2582E:98a-32: ji ltar sna tshogs 'dul gyur pa //
T02TD2582E:98a-33: chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor //
T02TD2582E:98a-35: chos kyi gnas su rdo rje dang //
T02TD2582E:98a-36: rin chen dang ni padma dang //
T02TD2582E:98a-37: las kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor //
T02TD2582E:98a-38: zhes bya bas rjes su gnang ba sbyin no //
T02TD2582E:98a-40: slob dpon bdag nyid langs la /
T02TD2582E:98a-41: skyob pa sh'akya seng ge'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan par byas la /
T02TD2582E:98a-42: g-yon pa khu tshur snying gar chos gos 'dzin pa'i tshul du byas la /
T02TD2582E:98a-43: g-yas pa mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i phyag rgya bcas la /
T02TD2582E:98a-44: aom nga yis khyod la lung bstan yin //
T02TD2582E:98a-45: 'jam pa'i rdo rje de bzhin gshegs //
T02TD2582E:98a-46: srid pa kun tu dag bas na //
T02TD2582E:98a-47: srid dang ngan 'gro rnams las bton //
T02TD2582E:98a-48: kye rdo rje che ge mo zhes bya ba yi //
T02TD2582E:98b-0: de bzhin @98b gshegs pa bhu ra bhu ba sva: zhes gzengs bstod do //
T02TD2582E:98b-1: de nas gsang ba bsgrags te //
T02TD2582E:98b-2: 'dod chags bral ba lta bu yi //
T02TD2582E:98b-3: khams gsum na ni sdig med de //
T02TD2582E:98b-4: de bas 'dod la chags bral bar //
T02TD2582E:98b-5: khyod kyis nam yang mi bya'o //
T02TD2582E:98b-6: ma h'a sa ma ya ha na h'um phat / dbugs dbyung ba'o //
T02TD2582E:98b-7: de nas lha'i sngags sbyin par bya ste /
T02TD2582E:98b-9: de nas gdams pa bstan par bya ste /
T02TD2582E:98b-10: khyod kyis mkhas pa'i gang zag la //
T02TD2582E:98b-11: sngags dang phyag rgya ma ston cig / de yis spyod na som nyi za //
T02TD2582E:98b-12: gnyis ka ngan song nyid du lhung //
T02TD2582E:98b-13: de nas slob ma'i spyi bor gdugs bzung la bskor ba byas la thal mo sbyar te /
T02TD2582E:98b-14: gdugs dang bcas pa dkyil 'khor gyi drung gi sa la lus btud la /
T02TD2582E:98b-15: sngags rnams 'dzin par gyur pa yi //
T02TD2582E:98b-16: slob ma 'di ni phul ba lags //
T02TD2582E:98b-17: de nas gdugs bzhag la slob ma'i snying la 'bab pa'i tshig dag brjod de /
T02TD2582E:98b-18: de ring dkyil 'khor slob dpon gyur //
T02TD2582E:98b-19: sngags dang rgyud kyang 'dzin par gyur //
T02TD2582E:98b-20: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang //
T02TD2582E:98b-21: lha rnams kun gyis bkur bar 'gyur //
T02TD2582E:98b-22: sems can kun la thugs brtse bas //
T02TD2582E:98b-23: dkyil 'khor cho ga bzhin du bris //
T02TD2582E:98b-24: sgrub pa po yang rgyud la sbyor //
T02TD2582E:98b-25: khyod kyis chos la ser sna dang //
T02TD2582E:98b-26: sems can rnams la mi phan pa //
T02TD2582E:98b-27: bu khyod kyis ni mi bya'o //
T02TD2582E:98b-28: de nas slar yang bstan bya ste //
T02TD2582E:98b-30: btsud pa dang ni mthong ba yis //
T02TD2582E:98b-31: de ring sdig pa rnam grol nas //
T02TD2582E:98b-32: de ring khyod rnams bde bar gnas //
T02TD2582E:98b-33: bde chen theg pa 'di la ni //
T02TD2582E:98b-34: phyin chad 'chi ba yong med cing //
T02TD2582E:98b-35: ni thub tshugs pa yong med pas //
T02TD2582E:98b-36: cis kyang mi 'jigs dga' bar gyis //
T02TD2582E:98b-37: srid pa shin tu dag pa na //
T02TD2582E:98b-38: srid pa'i sdug bsngal las 'das so //
T02TD2582E:98b-39: byang chub sems ni spang mi bya //
T02TD2582E:98b-40: dam pa'i chos ni smad mi bya //
T02TD2582E:98b-41: nam yang bor bar yang mi rung //
T02TD2582E:98b-42: mi shes pa dang rmongs pa la //
T02TD2582E:98b-43: de nyid bstan par mi bya'o //
T02TD2582E:98b-44: rdo rje dril bu mi spang zhing //
T02TD2582E:98b-45: slob dpon nam yang smad mi bya //
T02TD2582E:98b-46: sangs rgyas kun dang mtshungs pa yin //
T02TD2582E:98b-47: rang dga' yongs su bor nas ni //
T02TD2582E:98b-48: dka' thub kyis ni gdung mi bya //
T02TD2582E:98b-49: ji ltar bde bar bzung nas ni //
T02TD2582E:98b-50: sangs rgyas dngos grub thob par 'gyur //
T02TD2582E:99a-2: slob mas kyang phyag byas te /
T02TD2582E:99a-3: gtso bos ji ltar bka' stsal ba //
T02TD2582E:99a-4: de dag thams cad bdag gis bgyi //
T02TD2582E:99a-6: 'di ni slob dpon du dbang bskur ba'i cho ga'o /
T02TD2582E:99a-8: // / de nas gsang ba'i dbang bskur sbyin par bya ste /
T02TD2582E:99a-9: slob ma ye shes sems dpa' sku mdog dkar po zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa /
T02TD2582E:99a-10: phyag g-yas na ral gri g-yon pa na po ti bsnams pa bskyed la /
T02TD2582E:99a-11: gser ram dngul lam nya phyis kyi snod du aa ka ru nag po dang /
T02TD2582E:99a-16: de rnams kyi steng du stong pa chen po'i yi ge lnga dgod par bya ste /
T02TD2582E:99a-17: a'a: h'um aom hr'i: aa: de las 'od zer 'phros pas nam mkha'i khams nas ye shes kyi bdud rtsi drangs nas gnyis su med par bstims la aom a'a: h'um /
T02TD2582E:99a-18: zhes bya bas byin gyis brlabs la /
T02TD2582E:99a-20: ka ra'am bu ram la ril bu byas la /
T02TD2582E:99a-21: slob ma'i lce thog tu tshigs su bcad pa 'dis sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD2582E:99a-22: ji ltar 'jam dbyangs rgyal po yis //
T02TD2582E:99a-23: byang chub sras la dbang bskur bzhin //
T02TD2582E:99a-24: khyod la gsang ba'i dbang bskur bas //
T02TD2582E:99a-25: bdud rtsi lnga ni mnyam pa'i sems //
T02TD2582E:99a-26: nyon mongs lnga ni dag par byed //
T02TD2582E:99a-27: ye shes lnga yis dbang bskur ro //
T02TD2582E:99a-28: aom sarba dharmma aa bh'a ba sv'a bh'a ba bi shuddha /
T02TD2582E:99a-29: badzra badzra aa a'a am aa: 'di ni gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba'i cho ga'o //
T02TD2582E:99a-30: da ni nges pa'i dbang bskur bar bya ste /
T02TD2582E:99a-31: 'di khyod gzugs bzang ston pa yis //
T02TD2582E:99a-32: dam pa'i bde ba myong bar 'gyur //
T02TD2582E:99a-33: rig pa'i rnal 'byor sngom pa yis //
T02TD2582E:99a-34: sangs rgyas dngos grub thob par 'gyur //
T02TD2582E:99a-35: rmongs pa gang zhig 'di spong ba //
T02TD2582E:99a-36: de la mchog gi dngos grub med //
T02TD2582E:99a-37: ces bya ba sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD2582E:99a-38: dge slong dang ma ning dang /
T02TD2582E:99a-39: rgan po la ni lus kyi gnas bzhi ru 'khor lo bzhi bsgoms la /
T02TD2582E:99a-40: rkang ba'i gnas su yam las rlung gi dkyil 'khor gzhu'i dbyibs lta bu ba dan gyis mtshan pa /
T02TD2582E:99a-41: sum mdo'i gnas su ram las me'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum 'od zer dang bcas pas mtshan pa'o //
T02TD2582E:99a-42: rlung gi ba dan gyis me spar me lce gyen du 'bar ba'i 'od kyis rtsa dbu ma na yar yu shes kyi me 'bar bas spyi bo bde ba chen po la reg pas /
T02TD2582E:99b-0: thig le bcu drug @99b mgrin pa'i 'khor lo ru babs /
T02TD2582E:99b-1: mgrin pa nas snying gar 'dab brgyad du babs /
T02TD2582E:99b-2: snying ga nas lto bar thig le bzhi ru babs nas /
T02TD2582E:99b-3: lus mtha' dag thig le byang chub sems kyis gang nas slob ma'i lus la bde gsal gyi rnam par shes pa spros ba dang bral ba bde ba thams cad kyis lus gang bar bsam mo //
T02TD2582E:99b-4: de nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2582E:99b-6: thabs gzhan gyis ni sangs mi rgya //
T02TD2582E:99b-7: 'khor lo bzhi po mnyam pa'i ros //
T02TD2582E:99b-8: srid pa'i ro ni dag par byed //
T02TD2582E:99b-9: de bas khyod kyis 'di dang ni //
T02TD2582E:99b-10: nam yang bral bar mi bya'o //
T02TD2582E:99b-11: aom badzra sthi to hra di dzny'a na m'u rti ra ham buddho bu ddh'a n'am trya dhva bart'i n'am aom a'a: h'um /
T02TD2582E:99b-12: 'di ni nges pa'i dbang bskur ba'i cho ga'o //
T02TD2582E:99b-13: de ltar dbang rnam pa gsum rim gyis bskur bas //
T02TD2582E:99b-14: slob dpon gyi dbang gis ni rdos pa dang bcas pa'i lus shel sgong ltar dag par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2582E:99b-15: gsang ba'i dbang gis ni dri ma dang bcas pa'i ngag tshangs pa'i dbyangs lta bur 'gyur ro //
T02TD2582E:99b-16: nges pa'i dbang gis ni rtog pa dang bcas pa'i sems mar me lta bu 'gyur ro //
T02TD2582E:99b-17: de nas slob ma rnams kyis slob dpon la mchod pas mchod cing yon dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2582E:99b-18: dngos grub dam pa mnos pa yi //
T02TD2582E:99b-19: bla ma gang bzhed dbul bar bya //
T02TD2582E:99b-20: des ni bsod nams tshogs su 'gyur //
T02TD2582E:99b-21: de las dngos grub chen po 'byung //
T02TD2582E:99b-24: bdag dang gzhan gyi bde ba la longs spyod do //
T02TD2582E:99b-25: de'i rjes la lha rnams la mchod pa dang /
T02TD2582E:99b-26: bstod pa dang bzod par gsol ba dang /
T02TD2582E:99b-27: 'dod pa'i don la gsol pa gdab pa dang /
T02TD2582E:99b-28: dkyil 'khor bsdus la rim pa'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug pa dang /
T02TD2582E:99b-30: yi ge brgya pas dag par bya ba dang /
T02TD2582E:99b-31: dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo bar bya'o //
T02TD2582E:99b-32: de nas aom badzra k'i li k'i la ya sarba bighn'am badzra dha r'a dzny'a h'um h'um h'um h'um phat /
T02TD2582E:99b-33: ces pas phur bu bton la 'o mas bkru'o //
T02TD2582E:99b-34: aa k'a ro ma kham sarba dharmma n'am aa dy'a nutapanna tv'a ta ces tshon rtsi bsdus la /
T02TD2582E:99b-35: gar dang sil snyan lngan byas la //
T02TD2582E:99b-36: chu klung chen por bskyal bar bya //
T02TD2582E:99b-37: sdig pas mi gos ya ga med //
T02TD2582E:99b-38: de'i rjes la dkyil 'khor la ba'i rnam lngas byug go //
T02TD2582E:99b-39: yo byad rdzas rnams thams cad ni //
T02TD2582E:100a-1: dpon nyid kyis spyad par bya //
T02TD2582E:100a-2: bdag rang yod par mi 'dod na //
T02TD2582E:100a-3: dkon mchog gsum la dbul bar bya //
T02TD2582E:100a-4: sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir //
T02TD2582E:100a-5: byams pa chen po bsgom par bya //
T02TD2582E:100a-6: 'di ni dbang bskur ba'i cho ga'o //
T02TD2582E:100a-7: sku gsung thugs kyi rten gsum ni //
T02TD2582E:100a-8: zin ma thag tu rab gnas bya //
T02TD2582E:100a-9: zhes gsungs pas na rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga myur du byas na bkra shis pas rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga bya'o //
T02TD2582E:100a-10: de la sku rab tu gnas pa dang /
T02TD2582E:100a-11: gsung rab tu gnas pa dang /
T02TD2582E:100a-12: thugs rab tu gnas pa dang /
T02TD2582E:100a-14: de la sku rab tu gnas par bya ba ni mchod rten dang gtsug lag khang dang /
T02TD2582E:100a-17: 'bur du btod pa la sogs te /
T02TD2582E:100a-18: sku'i rigs su gtogs pa rnams so //
T02TD2582E:100a-19: gsung rab tu gnas pa ni glegs bam dang /
T02TD2582E:100a-20: dril bu dang rnga dang dung dang cha lang dang /
T02TD2582E:100a-21: phreng ba dang da ma ru la sogs pa mchod pa'i sgra'i bye brag gandi la sogs pa rnams so //
T02TD2582E:100a-22: thugs rab tu gnas pa ni rdo rje dang /
T02TD2582E:100a-25: ral gri dang be con la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2582E:100a-26: de la rab gnas byed pa'i slob dpon gyis gza' skar bzang po la gnas yid du 'ong bar bla re bres la spos chus chag chag btab pa dang /
T02TD2582E:100a-27: me tog gi sil ma bkram pa dang /
T02TD2582E:100a-28: bsnyen pa rdzogs par byas la sa'i cho ga dang /
T02TD2582E:100a-29: thig gdab cing gsol ba gdab pa la sogs pa byas la /
T02TD2582E:100a-30: tshon gyi las la sogs pas dkyil 'khor rdzogs par bris la /
T02TD2582E:100a-31: rang lha'i nga rgyal dang ldan pas //
T02TD2582E:100a-32: sku gzugs blta bar bya ste /
T02TD2582E:100a-33: dkyil 'khor gyi shar phyogs su ba'i rnam lngas mandala byas te /
T02TD2582E:100a-34: mandala de'i steng du ras dkar po bting la /
T02TD2582E:100a-35: de'i steng du rab gnas byed pa'i rten lugs sku dang po ti la sogs pa'i rab gnas bya bar 'os pa rnams bzhugs su gsol lo //
T02TD2582E:100a-36: sku gzugs la dang po na bza' ser po gsol la yungs kar khu tshur g-yas g-yon gnyis kyis len gsum bskor te /
T02TD2582E:100a-37: kham phor gyi me blugs shing sngags 'dis bsreg par bya'o //
T02TD2582E:100a-38: aom sarba p'a pam da ha na badzr'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD2582E:100a-39: de ltar me'i shis pa lan gsum gyi bar du bya'o //
T02TD2582E:100b-0: de nas til @100b mar d'ur ba'i pir gyis sku la byug par bya'o //
T02TD2582E:100b-1: ri mo la sogs pa ni me long gi gzugs brnyan la byug go //
T02TD2582E:100b-2: til mar bsku ba'i sngags ni aom sarba ta th'a ga ta k'a ya bi sho dha ni sv'a h'a /
T02TD2582E:100b-3: de nas bum pa chu dang rin po che lnga dang 'bru lnga dang /
T02TD2582E:100b-4: sman lnga dang ldan zhing dri zhim po'i chus yongs su gang ba'o//
T02TD2582E:100b-5: mgul pa ras bzang pos dkris la /
T02TD2582E:100b-6: kha rgyan bzang po dang ldan par byas la dbang bskur zhing bkru bar bya'o //
T02TD2582E:100b-7: aom bi shuddha badzrod ka h'um /
T02TD2582E:100b-8: zhes bya ba'i zhabs la rang rang gi snying po gang yin pa'i sngags bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD2582E:100b-9: tshigs bcad 'di dag brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2582E:100b-10: ji ltar bltams btsam gyis ni ;
T02TD2582E:100b-11: lha rnams kyis ni khrus gsol ltar //
T02TD2582E:100b-12: lha yi chu ni dag pa yis //
T02TD2582E:100b-13: de bzhin bdag gis sku khrus gsol //
T02TD2582E:100b-14: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa bhi she ka ta sa ma ya shri ye h'um /
T02TD2582E:100b-15: lugs ma khrus ni bya bar gsungs //
T02TD2582E:100b-16: ri mo me long dag la bkru //
T02TD2582E:100b-17: ras dkar dag gis sku phyis la //
T02TD2582E:100b-18: mandala steng du gzhag par bya //
T02TD2582E:100b-19: gsang sngags 'di yis dbang bskur bya /
T02TD2582E:100b-21: de nas ye shes sems dpa' dgug gzhug byas la /
T02TD2582E:100b-22: gnyis su med par bstim mo //
T02TD2582E:100b-23: de nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i mchog dang ldan pa'i skur bsams la /
T02TD2582E:100b-27: yang na lha gang dang gang yin pa de'i sa bon thugs kar dgod par bya'o //
T02TD2582E:100b-28: de'i rjes la mchod pa rnam pa lnga dang bstod pa bya'o //
T02TD2582E:100b-29: de nas lag pa g-yas par spos snod thogs la g-yon par dril bu dkrol zhing bus mos la btsugs te /
T02TD2582E:100b-30: 'di skad gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2582E:100b-31: bcom ldan rdo rje che ge mo //
T02TD2582E:100b-32: rig pa'i rgyal po phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02TD2582E:100b-33: mgon po thugs rje'i bdag nyid kyi //
T02TD2582E:100b-34: rab gnas bdag gis bgyi bar 'tshal //
T02TD2582E:100b-35: slob ma rnams la brtse ba dang //
T02TD2582E:100b-36: khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir //
T02TD2582E:100b-37: bcom ldan bdag ni gus pa la //
T02TD2582E:100b-38: bka' drin dag ni mdzad par 'os //
T02TD2582E:100b-39: 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal zhi mdzad pa'i //
T02TD2582E:100b-40: sangs rgyas bdag la dgongs su gsol //
T02TD2582E:100b-41: byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs bcas dang //
T02TD2582E:100b-42: gsang sngags lha rnams thams cad dang //
T02TD2582E:100b-43: 'jig rten skyong ba'i lha rnams dang //
T02TD2582E:100b-44: sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung mdzad dang //
T02TD2582E:100b-45: rig 'dzin rdo rje ming can rnams //
T02TD2582E:101a-2: rig pa'i rgyal po 'di la ni //
T02TD2582E:101a-3: ji ltar gus pa'i mchod pa dang //
T02TD2582E:101a-4: 'gro ba'i don phyir rab gnas bgyid //
T02TD2582E:101a-5: slob mas mchod dang bdag la ni //
T02TD2582E:101a-6: khyed kyi thugs rjes nges bzung ste //
T02TD2582E:101a-7: rab gnas 'di la byin rlabs mdzod //
T02TD2582E:101a-8: ces bya ba 'dis lha la snyan gsan dbab po //
T02TD2582E:101a-9: de skad ces brjod pas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad byon nas byin gyis rlob par bsam mo //
T02TD2582E:101a-10: 'di ni lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga'o //
T02TD2582E:101a-11: yang na bsnyen pa rdzogs pa dang sa'i cho ga zin par byas la /
T02TD2582E:101a-12: de nas lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga byas te /
T02TD2582E:101a-13: de nas phyi de'i dus su thig gi cho ga la sogs pa dang /
T02TD2582E:101a-14: dkyil 'khor sgrub pa rdzogs nas rab gnas bya'o //
T02TD2582E:101a-15: lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga rdzogs pa'i rjes la //
T02TD2582E:101a-16: rab gnas byed pa'i slob dpon de bza' ba dang btung ba la sogs pas khams rtas par byas la //
T02TD2582E:101a-17: dri bzang po'i chus khrus byas la dkyil 'khor sgrub pa'i cho gas yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
T02TD2582E:101a-18: de'i rjes la dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol du gtor ma yang btang la rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga byas te /
T02TD2582E:101a-19: lhag par gnas pa'i rten sku gzugs la sogs pa mandala gyi steng na lha mo de dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bzhag la lugs ma la sogs pa rnams sngon du bdag med par bsgoms te /
T02TD2582E:101a-20: skad cig tsam gyis rang rang gi lha bskyed la /
T02TD2582E:101a-21: de dang 'dra ba'i ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs la /
T02TD2582E:101a-22: mdun gyi nam mkhar byon pa la mchod yon dang /
T02TD2582E:101a-23: zhal bsil dang 'dod pa'i don la gsol ba gdab pa dang /
T02TD2582E:101a-24: mnyam med mi g-yos bstod pa byas la //
T02TD2582E:101a-26: zhes pas gnyis su med par bstims la /
T02TD2582E:101a-27: phyag rgya bzhis rgyas gdab pa dang /
T02TD2582E:101a-28: dbang bskur zhing rigs kyi bdag pos dbu brgyan la /
T02TD2582E:101a-29: mchod pa rnams kyis yang dag par mchod la rab gnas kyi lha de'i sngags mang du bzlas so //
T02TD2582E:101a-30: de nas yi ge brgya pas brtan par byas la gzhag go //
T02TD2582E:101a-31: gang lhag par byas pa rnams de ltar bya'o //
T02TD2582E:101a-32: de nas gser las byas pa'i thur mas spyan dbye bar bya ste /
