T02TD2582E:101a-33: aom badzra tsakshu sa manta tsakshu bi sho dha ne sv'a h'a /
T02TD2582E:101a-34: de nas sbyin sreg gis mnyes shing bsod nams spel bar bya ste /
T02TD2582E:101b-0: lha khang dang mchod @101b rten la sogs pa ni yi ge bhr'um las skad cig ma tsam gyis rnam par snang mdzad du bskyed la ye shes sems dpa' gzhug pa'i cho ga byas la /
T02TD2582E:101b-1: de yongs su gyur pa las mchod rten gyi gzugs su bsgoms la /
T02TD2582E:101b-2: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi gzhal yas khang du bsams la /
T02TD2582E:101b-3: mgon po sras dang bcas pa dang //
T02TD2582E:101b-4: gsang sngags dang rig pa'i lha thams cad spyan drangs te bcug la /
T02TD2582E:101b-5: mchod pa'i yo byad rnams kyis yang dag par mchod la /
T02TD2582E:101b-6: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta a'a be sha ye sv'a h'a /
T02TD2582E:101b-7: aom su pra tishtha badzre sv'a h'a /
T02TD2582E:101b-8: aom h'um hr'i: bhr'um tr'am hr'i: he zhes bya bas rab tu gnas par bya'o //
T02TD2582E:101b-9: de nas phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlab par bsam mo //
T02TD2582E:101b-10: glegs bam la sogs pa gsung rab tu gnas pa ni po ti la sogs pa mi dmigs par bsams la /
T02TD2582E:101b-11: yi ge a'a: las 'od dpag tu med par bsam la /
T02TD2582E:101b-12: ye shes sems dpa' gzhug pa'i cho ga rdzogs par byas la /
T02TD2582E:101b-13: de yongs su gyur pa las glegs bam gsung yig 'brur bsgom mo //
T02TD2582E:101b-14: gsung gi bye brag gzhan ni rang rang gi ngo bor gyur par bsam mo //
T02TD2582E:101b-15: de la mchod pa'i yo byad de dag gis yang dag par mchod la /
T02TD2582E:101b-16: aom h'um hr'i: zhes bya bas rab tu gnas par bya'o //
T02TD2582E:101b-17: de nas phyogs bcun bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs par bsam mo //
T02TD2582E:101b-18: rdo rje la sogs pa'i rab tu gnas pa ni //
T02TD2582E:101b-19: rdo rje la sogs pa mi dmigs par bsgoms la /
T02TD2582E:101b-20: yi ge h'um las mi bskyod par bsams la ye shes sems dpa' dgug gzhug la sogs pa byas la /
T02TD2582E:101b-21: de yongs su gyur pa las thugs phyag mtshan du bsgoms la /
T02TD2582E:101b-22: de las mchod pa'i yo byad kyis mchod la /
T02TD2582E:101b-23: aom a'a: h'um zhes bya bas rab tu gnas par bya'o //
T02TD2582E:101b-24: de nas phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par bsam mo //
T02TD2582E:101b-25: de la sil snyan dang rol mo la sogs pas mchod do //
T02TD2582E:101b-26: 'byor pa chung ba rnams kyi don du dkyil 'khor dang lhag par gnas pa med par nyi ma gcig la rab gnas rdzogs par byed par 'dod na bdag nyid rang gi lhag pa'i lhar bsgoms la /
T02TD2582E:101b-27: khrus la sogs pa sdar bzhin du kun rdzogs par bya'o //
T02TD2582E:102a-2: bdag med pa'i bsam gtan sngon du 'gro bas lugs ma la sogs pa skad cig tsam gyis lhar bsgoms la ye shes sems dpa' bstims la /
T02TD2582E:102a-3: rgyas gdab pa dang dbang bskur ba byas la mchod pa dang bstod pa byas te /
T02TD2582E:102a-4: de nyid kyi sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par bsam mo //
T02TD2582E:102a-5: de nas yi ge brgya pas brtan par byas la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gsol pa gdab cing rten 'brel gyi snying pos byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02TD2582E:102a-6: 'di ni rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga'o /
T02TD2582E:102a-9: // / shi ba'i don du gsungs pa yi //
T02TD2582E:102a-10: ro spyod dkyil 'khor cho ga ni //
T02TD2582E:102a-11: shi ba'i ro la 'bad byas na //
T02TD2582E:102a-12: rnam par grol bar the tshom med //
T02TD2582E:102a-13: de la dang po rnal 'byor pas //
T02TD2582E:102a-14: snying rje chen po dang ldan pa //
T02TD2582E:102a-15: rtog pa'i dri mas ma gos pa //
T02TD2582E:102a-16: sems dpa' dang ni ldan pa yis //
T02TD2582E:102a-17: gong bzhin tshe 'phos don du ni //
T02TD2582E:102a-18: ro yi sbyin sreg dkyil 'khor ni //
T02TD2582E:102a-19: byas na bde 'gror nges par skye //
T02TD2582E:102a-20: rgyu de'i ri ma gyis bla med pa'i //
T02TD2582E:102a-21: rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur //
T02TD2582E:102a-22: skyes pa'am bud med la sogs pa //
T02TD2582E:102a-23: gang yang rung ba shi ba'i lus //
T02TD2582E:102a-24: dkyil 'khor bcug ste dbang bskur na //
T02TD2582E:102a-25: sems can dmyal bar skyes na yang //
T02TD2582E:102a-26: de ma thag tu thar nas ni //
T02TD2582E:102a-27: lha yi nang du skye 'gyur na //
T02TD2582E:102a-28: sdig pa chung ngu byas pa rnams //
T02TD2582E:102a-29: lta smos kyang ni ci dgos pa //
T02TD2582E:102a-30: de nas sngon du bsnyen pa byas nas //
T02TD2582E:102a-31: dben pa'i gnas su ro bzhag la //
T02TD2582E:102a-32: ro de la srog gcod pa'i ro langs kyi bgegs zhugs nas 'ong bas //
T02TD2582E:102a-33: de bskrad par bya ba'i phyir bdag nyid khor bo gshin rje gshed kyi nga rgyal dang ldan pas //
T02TD2582E:102a-34: mig gnyis su ma dang ta las nyi ma zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du h'um bsams la /
T02TD2582E:102a-35: stad stabs dang bcas pas bgegs bskrad par bya'o //
T02TD2582E:102a-36: de nas bum pa mgul chings kha rgyan sngon po dang ldan pa'i spos chus bkru bar bya ste /
T02TD2582E:102a-37: bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjer bskyed la /
T02TD2582E:102a-38: na mo bha ga ba te sarba du rga ti pa ri sho dha ni r'a dz'a ya /
T02TD2582E:102a-40: aarha te smya ksam sam buddh'a ya /
T02TD2582E:102a-43: sarba p'a pam bi shoddha ne /
T02TD2582E:102a-45: sarba karma a'a ba ra na bi shuddhe sv'a h'a /
T02TD2582E:102a-46: zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis bku bar bya'o //
T02TD2582E:102b-0: de @102b nas ga pur la sogs pa'i dris byugs la /
T02TD2582E:102b-1: me tog gi phreng bas brgyan la /
T02TD2582E:102b-2: lag pa thal mo snying gar sbyar la /
T02TD2582E:102b-3: rang gi yi dam gyi lhar bskyed do //
T02TD2582E:102b-4: yi dam gyi lha med pa rnams ni //
T02TD2582E:102b-5: spyi bo'i aa'i 'phro 'dus dag par byas la /
T02TD2582E:102b-6: skad cig tsam gyis 'phags pa 'jam dpal sku mdog ser po rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par bskyed la /
T02TD2582E:102b-7: de'i dbang po yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir ro'i spyi bor aom /
T02TD2582E:102b-8: mgrin par a'a: snying gar h'um gro ga la bris la bag zan gyis bskus la glan par bya'o //
T02TD2582E:102b-9: ras dkar po gtsang ma ga pur gyi chus bkrus pas ro g-yogs la /
T02TD2582E:102b-10: shing leb kyi steng du bzhag la ro'i snying ga na gzungs thag gis btags la /
T02TD2582E:102b-11: bdag nyid lha'i dkyil 'khor du bskyed la /
T02TD2582E:102b-12: gzungs thag nas bzung la bzlas pa bya'o //
T02TD2582E:102b-13: bzlas pa byed pa'i dus su de'i shes pa aa'am mar me'i rnam pa lta bu bkug cing shes pa de phung po la bstim mo //
T02TD2582E:102b-14: de nas snying ga'i 'od zer gyi khams gsum gyi sdig pa sbyang ngo //
T02TD2582E:102b-16: ga pur gyi chus byug / bzlas pas skyo na /
T02TD2582E:102b-17: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das //
T02TD2582E:102b-18: sdig pa thams cad sbyang mdzad pa //
T02TD2582E:102b-19: 'dren pa'i stobs ldan thams cad mkhyen //
T02TD2582E:102b-20: thugs rje chen por byin rlabs kyis //
T02TD2582E:102b-24: de ltar bsnyen pa 'bum phrag gcig gam /
T02TD2582E:102b-26: 'bum phrag brgya la sogs pa bzlas par byas la /
T02TD2582E:102b-27: de nas zhi ba'i sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad kyi bar du til gyis ro la bskor cing sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02TD2582E:102b-28: de'i dus su sbyin pa dang gtor ma dang /
T02TD2582E:102b-29: dge 'dun la ston mo la sogs pa bya'o //
T02TD2582E:102b-30: sngon du bsnyen pa'i cho ga'o //
T02TD2582E:102b-31: de nas dkyil 'khor bya ba'i gnas ni gtsug lag khang dang /
T02TD2582E:102b-35: rang gi gnas sam gang yang rung ba r'u ba'i cho ga dang /
T02TD2582E:102b-36: thig dang tshon gyi cho ga la sogs pas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2582E:102b-37: de nas bum pa dgram pa dang /
T02TD2582E:102b-38: mchod pa'i yo byad thams cad rdzogs par bshams la /
T02TD2582E:102b-39: dkyil 'khor sgrub pa'i cho ga gzhung ba zhin du byas te /
T02TD2582E:102b-40: mchod pa dang bstod pa la sogs pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
T02TD2582E:103a-1: kyi phyogs bzhir gtor ma bzhi btang la dkyil 'khor gyi lho phyogs su ba'i rnam ldas mandala byas la de'i steng du ro bzhag ste /
T02TD2582E:103a-2: slob ma dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa'i tshul du ro de dkyil 'khor du gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD2582E:103a-4: bsod nams kyi tshogs bsags pa dang /
T02TD2582E:103a-6: dkyil 'khor du me tog dor te /
T02TD2582E:103a-8: dkyil 'khor du bcug la lha ngo bstan pa dang /
T02TD2582E:103a-9: rig pa'i dbang dang gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba la sogs pa ste dbang rnams rdzogs par bskur bar bya'o //
T02TD2582E:103a-10: de nas cho ga 'di brtsam par bya'o //
T02TD2582E:103a-11: dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad ro'i snying gar bsdus la /
T02TD2582E:103a-12: ro de dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bzhag ste /
T02TD2582E:103a-13: lha'i sras po bzhin du rgyan dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan la sogs pa dang /
T02TD2582E:103a-14: rol mo la sogs kyis mchod par bya'o //
T02TD2582E:103a-15: de nas spro ba bskyed par bya ba ni tshig 'di ched du brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2582E:103a-16: deng dus bdag tshe 'bras bu yod //
T02TD2582E:103a-17: bdag gis gson pa'ang 'bras bu bcas //
T02TD2582E:103a-18: dam tshig lha dang mnyam par ni //
T02TD2582E:103a-19: bdag nyid gyur par the tshom med //
T02TD2582E:103a-20: byang chub sems dang sems gcig pas //
T02TD2582E:103a-21: phyir mi ldog par bdag gyur te /
T02TD2582E:103a-22: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su ni //
T02TD2582E:103a-23: deng bdag skye bar the tshom med //
T02TD2582E:103a-24: 'dir ni bdag nyid dam pa ste //
T02TD2582E:103a-25: mchog sbyin 'di ni bla na med //
T02TD2582E:103a-26: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas spyan 'dren pas //
T02TD2582E:103a-28: de nas phyag byas spos snod thogs la /
T02TD2582E:103a-31: dbang ni nges te bla na med //
T02TD2582E:103a-32: phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kun ;
T02TD2582E:103a-33: ; ma lus bdag la dgongs su gsol //
T02TD2582E:103a-34: bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba yis //
T02TD2582E:103a-35: shi la phan gdags don ched du //
T02TD2582E:103a-36: gnas 'dir sangs rgyas kun gshegs te //
T02TD2582E:103a-37: 'di la dbang ni stsal du gsol //
T02TD2582E:103a-38: zhes bya bas spro ba bskyed par bya'o //
T02TD2582E:103a-39: de nas zhag gnyis pa man chod na bdag nyid ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor bsgom pa ni //
T02TD2582E:103a-40: dang po sbyor ba nas yongs su rdzogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bar bsgoms la mchod pa dang bstod pa rdzogs pa dang /
T02TD2582E:103a-41: de'i rjes la gsang sngags kyi bzlas pa 'di bya'o //
T02TD2582E:103a-42: aa a'a sarba ta th'a ga ta hri da ya ha ra ha ra /
T02TD2582E:103b-0: bha ga p'an dzny'a na m'u rtti w'a g'i shva ra ma h'a w'a tsa sarba @103b dharmma ga ga na aa ma la su pa ri shuddha dharmma dh'a tu dzny'a na garbha a'a:/
T02TD2582E:103b-1: de nas bzlas pa rdzogs pa dang tshigs su bcad pa 'di brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2582E:103b-2: shi la phan gdags don byed du //
T02TD2582E:103b-3: mchog sbyin rdo rje mchog khyod 'dud //
T02TD2582E:103b-4: ye shes sku nyid khyod la 'dud //
T02TD2582E:103b-5: ces pa'i bar du brjod de de nas bstod pa rdzogs pa dang /
T02TD2582E:103b-6: bdag gi ting nge 'dzin gyis dkyil 'khor bdag la bsdus te /
T02TD2582E:103b-7: ro'i mig gnyis la aa re bsams la /
T02TD2582E:103b-8: de las 'od 'phros pas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drang la /
T02TD2582E:103b-9: mdun gyi nam mkha' la byon par bsam la /
T02TD2582E:103b-10: bum pa zla b'i mdog lta bus ro la dbang bskur bar bsam mo //
T02TD2582E:103b-11: de nas rnal 'byor pa bdag gis kyang rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pas dbang bskur zhing bkru bar bya'o //
T02TD2582E:103b-12: de nas bsrung ba'i sngags ni aom pra kri ti pa ri shuddha: sarba dharmma pra kri ti pa ri shuddho& ham /
T02TD2582E:103b-13: zhes pas bkru zhing dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02TD2582E:103b-14: de nas aom ya m'anta ka h'um phat /
T02TD2582E:103b-15: ces bya bas ro de la bar du gcod pa'i bgegs bskrad la /
T02TD2582E:103b-16: aom a'a: h'um zhes bya bas ro'i lus ngag yid gsum gyi gnas gsum du byin gyis brlabs la bsrung ba byas la gzhag go //
T02TD2582E:103b-17: de nas lho phyogs su dkyil 'khor gyi ro la bskor zhing sbyin sreg byas la sdig pa sbyang ngo //
T02TD2582E:103b-18: de ltar zhag bdun nam lnga'am /
T02TD2582E:103b-20: de ni ro'i dkyil 'khor chen por gzhag cing dbang bskur ba'i cho ga ste de ni gnas pa'i cho ga'o //
T02TD2582E:103b-21: shi ba sta gon la gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin to //
T02TD2582E:103b-22: dur khrod 'jigs pa spangs pa'i sar //
T02TD2582E:103b-23: ro yi sbyin sreg bya ba ni //
T02TD2582E:103b-25: sa yi cho ga gzhung bzhin bya //
T02TD2582E:103b-26: gong du cho ga rdzogs pa nas //
T02TD2582E:103b-27: sta gon cho ga bya mi dgos //
T02TD2582E:103b-28: de nas stegs bu rgyar khru phyed dang nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa dpangs su khru gang brtsigs la ba'i rnam lngas byugs la de'i dbus su thab khung rgyar khru bzhi pa zabs su khru do pa khung bu brus la /
T02TD2582E:103b-29: de'i kha khyer la zhing du sor brgyad pa //
T02TD2582E:103b-30: 'phang du sor bzhi dang ldan par bya'o //
T02TD2582E:103b-31: sa gzhi de thams cad tsandan dkar po'i chu dang sa dkar gyi chus byugs la /
T02TD2582E:103b-32: thab khung gi nang du padma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i bri'o //
T02TD2582E:103b-33: de'i kha khyer la phyogs bzhir rdo rje phreng ba bri //
T02TD2582E:103b-34: mtshams bzhir 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi bri //
T02TD2582E:103b-35: de'i mtha' mar ka pa bzhi btsugs la /
T02TD2582E:104a-0: @104a * // de'i steng du so phag las sreg khang mchod rten dang 'dra ba brtsig par bya ste /
T02TD2582E:104a-1: skar khung bzhi dang ldan par bya'o //
T02TD2582E:104a-2: dmangs tha mal pa la ni bang rim med pa bya'o //
T02TD2582E:104a-3: blon po dang rgyal po la ni bang rim gcig pa bya'o /
T02TD2582E:104a-4: dge bsnyen la ni bar rim gnyis pa bya'o //
T02TD2582E:104a-5: dge slong la ni bar rim gsum pa bya'o //
T02TD2582E:104a-6: rdo rje 'dzin pa la ni bar rim bzhi pa bya'o //
T02TD2582E:104a-7: de'i bum pa'i nang du ro bzhag la /
T02TD2582E:104a-8: tsandan dang shug pa la sogs pa'i bud shing la sogs pa gzhag go //
T02TD2582E:104a-9: tshe 'das pa'i don du phyogs bzhi'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i sbyin sreg bzhi yang bya ste /
T02TD2582E:104a-10: dkyil 'khor de'i shar phyogs su zhi ba'i thab khung bya'o//
T02TD2582E:104a-11: lhor rgyas pa'i thab khung bya'o //
T02TD2582E:104a-12: nub du dbang gi thab khung bya'o //
T02TD2582E:104a-13: byang du mngon spyod kyi thab khung bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2582E:104a-14: de nas sbyin sreg gi rdzas mar dang /
T02TD2582E:104a-15: til dang me tog dkar po dang /
T02TD2582E:104a-19: mngar gsum gyi rul bu dang /
T02TD2582E:104a-20: dkar gsum dang de rnams ga pur gyi chus byugs la /
T02TD2582E:104a-21: g-yas phyogs su gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD2582E:104a-22: yam shing tsandan la sogs pas byas la /
T02TD2582E:104a-23: de yang sor nyi shu rtsa bzhi byas la de'i rtsa ba zlum por byas te rtse mo ral gri lta bur byas la /
T02TD2582E:104a-24: g-yon phyogs su gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD2582E:104a-25: mdun du ni mchod pa'i yo byad rnams bsham mo //
T02TD2582E:104a-26: de nas sngags pa chas gos dang ldan pas shin tu bsgyings pa'i rgyan dang ldan par byas la /
T02TD2582E:104a-27: dkyil 'khor de'i phyogs bzhir gtor ma btang la /
T02TD2582E:104a-28: de'i rjes la bdag nyid gnas su 'dug la /
T02TD2582E:104a-29: 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed kyi nga rgyal dang ldan pas bsrung ba'i 'khor lo bya'o //
T02TD2582E:104a-30: de'i rjes la mchod pa rnams byin gyis brlabs la sreg rdzas dang yam shing la ni /
T02TD2582E:104a-31: aom a'a: h'um zhes byin gyis brlab po //
T02TD2582E:104a-32: de nas rlung yab kyis me spar la /
T02TD2582E:104a-33: aom aagan ye ram ram dzra la ram sv'a h'a /
T02TD2582E:104a-35: mar khu gzar bu gsum me'i nang du blugs so //
T02TD2582E:104a-36: de nas ye shes kyi sreg khang chen por nyon mongs pa'i dri ma dang bag chags kyi dri ma bsreg par bya ba dang /
T02TD2582E:104a-37: ngan song rnam par gsum gyi rgyud sbyang bar bya ba'i phyir rnal 'byor pa snying rje chen po dang ldan pas ye shes kyi me spar ba ni /
T02TD2582E:104b-0: gson cig dgongs shig @104b rigs kyi bu //
T02TD2582E:104b-1: phung po lnga yi bud shing la //
T02TD2582E:104b-2: rgyal ba rigs lnga'i me spar ro //
T02TD2582E:104b-3: nyon mongs lnga yi bud shing la //
T02TD2582E:104b-4: ye shes lnga yi me spar ro //
T02TD2582E:104b-5: 'byung ba lnga yi bud shing la //
T02TD2582E:104b-6: rnam thar bzhi yi me spar ro //
T02TD2582E:104b-7: zhes bya bas me spar la //
T02TD2582E:104b-8: de nas me de'i nang du dang por bsgom par bya ba ni yi ge aa las zla ba bsgoms la /
T02TD2582E:104b-9: de'i steng du aa dkar po bsam mo //
T02TD2582E:104b-10: aa de las 'od 'phros pas gdug pa thams cad btul nas slar 'dus nas 'od du zhu ba las //
T02TD2582E:104b-11: thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin gyi me lha kha dog dkar po la shin tu rid pa'i brang rus can dbu la ye shes sems dpas brgyan par bsgom mo //
T02TD2582E:104b-12: de ltar bsgoms nas ye shes sems dpa' dgug gzhug bya ba ni /
T02TD2582E:104b-13: tshur byon tshur gshegs me lha'i tshogs //
T02TD2582E:104b-14: drang srong bram ze spyan gsum pa //
T02TD2582E:104b-15: sgeg blugs zhal zas bzhes nas kyang //
T02TD2582E:104b-16: 'bar ba'i gdan la bzhugs su gsol //
T02TD2582E:104b-18: ae hye gi aagna ye dza: h'um bam ho: //
T02TD2582E:104b-20: gnyis su med par bstims la /
T02TD2582E:104b-21: sku gsung thugs su byin gyis brlab po //
T02TD2582E:104b-22: me lha de la mar gyi dgang blugs bdun dbul bar bya ste /
T02TD2582E:104b-23: na ma: sa manta bh'u ta n'um /
T02TD2582E:104b-25: ha bya ka by'a ti bya sh'antim ku ra we sv'a h'a /
T02TD2582E:104b-26: zhes mar gyi dgang blugs phul la me lha'i bstod pa bya ste /
T02TD2582E:104b-27: 'jig rten dbang phyug tshangs pa mchog gi sras //
T02TD2582E:104b-28: me lha'i rgyal po rigs lnga dbang bskur ba //
T02TD2582E:104b-29: ye shes mchog nyid nyon mongs thams cad bsreg /'dzin mdzad me yi lha la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02TD2582E:104b-31: de nas me lha'i thugs ka ru ;
T02TD2582E:104b-32: ; aa las bskyed pa'i zla stengs su //
T02TD2582E:104b-33: yi ge bh'um las yongs bskyed pa'i //
T02TD2582E:104b-34: shin tu legs pa'i gzhal yas khang //
T02TD2582E:104b-35: gong du bstan dang mthun pa las //
T02TD2582E:104b-36: shin tu legs pa'i sgo bzhi pa //
T02TD2582E:104b-37: dra ba'i sgo ni shar phyogs te //
T02TD2582E:104b-38: de nas gang shi de nyid kyi //
T02TD2582E:104b-39: rnam shes mtshan gyi sngags su gyur //
T02TD2582E:104b-40: de yi yig 'bru rnams su gyur //
T02TD2582E:104b-41: yig 'bru las ni lhar bskyed la //
T02TD2582E:104b-42: de yi ye shes sems dpa' yang //
T02TD2582E:104b-43: gong bzhin bsdu dang dgug gzhug bya //
T02TD2582E:104b-44: de nas mchod pa'i bye brag rnams dang /
T02TD2582E:104b-45: bstod pas yang dag par mchod la //
T02TD2582E:104b-46: sreg rdzas dbul bar bya ste /
T02TD2582E:105a-0: aa a'a sarba ta th'a ga ta hri da ya ha ra @105a * //
T02TD2582E:105a-2: aom h'um hr'i: bha ga b'an dzny'a na r'u rti b'a g'i shvar ma h'a w'a tsa sarba ddharmma ga ga na aa ma la su pa ri shuddha dharmma dh'a tu dzny'a na garbha a'a: sarba p'a pam che ge mo'i sgrib pa sh'a ntim ku ra we sv'a h'a /
T02TD2582E:105a-3: zhes bya bas sbyin sreg gi rdza thams cad lan brgya rtsa brgyad kyi bar du dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2582E:105a-4: sreg rdzas thams cad bdud rtsir byin gyis brlabs shing dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2582E:105a-5: bar bar du ming 'di zhes bya ba'i nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa dang /
T02TD2582E:105a-6: bag chags kyi sgrib pa thams cad sarba p'a pam da ha na badzra che ge mo sh'antim ku ra we sv'a h'a /
T02TD2582E:105a-7: zhes brjod cing ti la bsreg go / yang na sbyin sreg gi rdzas rnams la sbyin sreg gi cho ga rim pa gnyis pa'i ye shes brtag gnas dang mthun pa ru /
T02TD2582E:105a-8: sreg rdzas rnams la rang rang gi ming dang bcas pa rnams dbul lo //
T02TD2582E:105a-9: sbyin sreg rdzogs pa dang bstod pa bya ste /
T02TD2582E:105a-10: shi la phan gdags don ched du //
T02TD2582E:105a-11: mchog sbyin rdo rje mchog khyod 'dud//
T02TD2582E:105a-13: rjes la lam bstan pa bya ba ni //
T02TD2582E:105a-14: tshogs gnyis bsags pa'i gang zag de //
T02TD2582E:105a-15: dkyil 'khor lha ni rtag bsgoms nas //
T02TD2582E:105a-16: dkyil 'khor lha dang mnyam byas te //
T02TD2582E:105a-17: de nas rim bzhin bsdus nas ni //
T02TD2582E:105a-18: gtso bo'i thugs kar aa la thim //
T02TD2582E:105a-19: yi ge aa yi ngo bor bsdu //
T02TD2582E:105a-21: phyogs bcu nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pas //
T02TD2582E:105a-22: ngan song gsum dang mi khom brgyad //
T02TD2582E:105a-23: 'gro ba drug po rnam sbyangs nas //
T02TD2582E:105a-24: kun kyang bde gshegs sku ru bsgyur //
T02TD2582E:105a-25: yang yang dbyings kyi dang du thim //
T02TD2582E:105a-26: thams cad nam mkha' 'dra bar bsgom //
T02TD2582E:105a-27: ting 'dzin chen po'i byin brlabs kyis //
T02TD2582E:105a-28: sangs rgyas sa ni 'di nyid de //
T02TD2582E:105a-29: srid pa bar do 'di nyid yin //
T02TD2582E:105a-30: khyod kyi lam ni mthar phyin shog //
T02TD2582E:105a-31: phung po lnga ni sangs rgyas nyid //
T02TD2582E:105a-32: nyon mongs ldan ni ye shes lnga //
T02TD2582E:105a-33: 'byung ba lnga ni rnam thar bzhi //
T02TD2582E:105a-34: srid pa'i 'khor lo rgyun bcad nas //
T02TD2582E:105a-35: sangs rgyas sa ni rnam par dag //
T02TD2582E:105a-36: 'khor ba bya ba'i ming yang med //
T02TD2582E:105a-38: de nas mos lam gdab pa ni //
T02TD2582E:105a-39: tshe 'das pa'i sgrib pa rnam par dag nas tshogs gnyis rdzogs te /
T02TD2582E:105a-40: bla na med pa'i byang chub chen po thob par gyur cig //
T02TD2582E:105a-41: 'di ni lam bstan pa'i rim pa'o //
T02TD2582E:105b-0: @105b de nas me lha la rdzas kyi lhag ma ci yod pa bsogs la /
T02TD2582E:105b-1: des me lha la sbyin sreg bya ste /
T02TD2582E:105b-2: rdzas rnams bdud rtsir byin gyis brlabs la /
T02TD2582E:105b-3: brgya rtsa brgyad kyi bar du dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2582E:105b-4: aom badzra aa na la ma h'a bh'u ta dzva l'a ya sarba bha smi ku ru sarba p'a pam che ge mo sh'antim ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02TD2582E:105b-5: zhes pas sreg rdzas thams cad spyi'i sngags 'dis dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2582E:105b-6: de nas me lha la bstod pa bya ste /
T02TD2582E:105b-7: tshangs pa 'jig rten mgon skyong ba //
T02TD2582E:105b-8: gzi brjid ldan pa me yi lha //
T02TD2582E:105b-9: 'bar bcas sku ni rgyan gyis bzhugs //
T02TD2582E:105b-10: rngam brjid rgyan ldan las la dbang //
T02TD2582E:105b-11: sreg rdza phul bas las kyang 'grub //
T02TD2582E:105b-12: zhi la sogs pa'i lha dpal des //
T02TD2582E:105b-13: ji ltar 'dod pa'i don grub pa //
T02TD2582E:105b-14: gzi brjid rgyan ldan phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02TD2582E:105b-16: de dag rdzogs pa dang bzod par gsol la gshegs su gsol lo //
T02TD2582E:105b-17: de nas me tog lag tu thogs la yi ge brgya pa lan bdun bzlas la sreg khang du gtor bar bya'o //
T02TD2582E:105b-18: tshe 'das pa'i sdig pa bcom pa'i rtags ni me lce stang du drang por 'bar ba dang /
T02TD2582E:105b-19: du ba la sogs pa nag nog med pa dang /
T02TD2582E:105b-20: zlum zhing phyogs gzhan du mi 'bro ba dang /
T02TD2582E:105b-23: yang me lha'i gzugs sreg khang du ston pa dang /
T02TD2582E:105b-24: rtags de ni tshe 'das pa ngan song gi gnas nas grol ba'i rtags yin no //
T02TD2582E:105b-25: tshe 'das pa'i don du phyogs bzhi rigs bzi'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i sbyin sreg ji lta ba bzhin du bya ba ni //
T02TD2582E:105b-26: de nyid kyi tshe dang longs spyod rgyas par bya ba dang /
T02TD2582E:105b-27: nad la sogs pa'i dgon zhi bar bya ba dang /
T02TD2582E:105b-28: lha la sogs pa'i 'jig rten gsum dbang du gyur par bya ba dang /
T02TD2582E:105b-29: dgra dang ma rungs pa gzhom pa'i don du'o //
T02TD2582E:105b-30: de nas tshogs bdag cing dge ba'i don la sbyar bar bya ste /
T02TD2582E:105b-31: rus pa thal bar bsdus nas kyang //
T02TD2582E:105b-32: mchod rten la sogs las byas te /
T02TD2582E:105b-33: gsod nams bsags shing smon lam gdab //
T02TD2582E:105b-35: 'byor pa chud [*chung] pa rnams kyis ni zhag bdun gyi nang du thams cad rdzogs par bya'o //
T02TD2582E:105b-36: 'di ni ro sreg ba'i cho ga'o /
T02TD2582E:105b-39: yon tan thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas //
T02TD2582E:105b-40: thun mong ma yin khyad 'phags pa'i //
T02TD2582E:105b-41: gsang bar 'os pa'i cho ga ste //
T02TD2582E:105b-42: 'di byas pa yi bsod nams kyis //
T02TD2582E:106a-0: @106a * // des ni 'jig rten thams cad kyis //
T02TD2582E:106a-1: dri med ye shes thob nas kyang //
T02TD2582E:106a-2: gzugs skus 'gro ba'i don byed shog /'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga yon tan 'byung gnas zhes bya ba /
T02TD2582E:106a-3: slob dpon dpal ldan byang chub mchog gi skal ba dang ldan pa zhes bya ba /
T02TD2582E:106a-4: gzhan yang skye ba gcig la mtshan lnga thob pa'i slob dpon de'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD2582E:106a-6: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po smri ti dzny'a na k'i rtis bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o /
T02TD2582E:106a-8: // / phyis slob dpon 'phags pa mchog gis kyang zhus nas gtan la phab ste 'gyur phyi ma yang yin no//
